67b1(1): cad ses paka pas shi smra langs par gyur mi// sems can thams can de bzhin pa byas pa'i sna rab rgya ci las dang med par gyur cig/ sems na thams par me ge pa'i na thams cangasas da
67b2(1): gyur te/ sman pa lta bur gur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman a da lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i
67b3(1): drug gi gsal shing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi slad du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing tsA bar 'gro ba'i ngang rdul can du gyur cig/ sems
67b4(1): car thams cad shin du ri 'khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhin sngar gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bso ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lta bur gyur cig/ sems na
67b5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sran gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sman la ma
67b6(1): nabs par gyur cag ces de ltar byang chub se ma pa' sman gyi sbyir ba byed pa'irwa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin du gso ba'i phyir
67b7(1): 'ongs sa su'o/ shin du bde ning dga' ba'i phyir yongs su 'o/ sems can thams cad shin rnam par dag par bya
68a1(1): phyir yongs su sngar// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan mi mnga' blta bur btu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rdzu'o// sems can thams cad kyi nang kyi zub rngurnams
68a2(1): cang bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su sdul// sems can thams cad kyi lus nyams pa med cing brtan pa'i phyir yongs su sngol// sems can thams cad rdo rje'i ri khang yug lta bur gnam du mims pa da/ 
68a3(1): stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngag// sems can thams cad spobs thams cad kyis brtan cing / bsam pa shin du mtho ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// sems can thams cad kyis
68a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa ril gyis mi gnon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngal// sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byir gyis rlabs kyis bcan
68a5(1): ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang bre dang / lnga bres sbyin pa byed pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi snod dang / gser gyi ze dang / 
68a6(1): ze rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi snong dang / dngul gyi ze dang / lnga bre rin pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ bedur+ya'i rtse
68a7(1): ngas byeng+ge'i thes laze rin pa che rnam pa za nga pas yongs su babang ba dang / 'dis ste/ shes kyi snang nge/ shes kyi phre dang/ lnga ze rin pa che'i rgyan rnam pa mang nga bas yangs
68b1(1): bkang ba dang / 'di la ste mu sa ra gal ba'i snod dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i bre dang / lA bre mu tig dmar pos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste a s+tha gang ba'i snod dang / a smA
68b2(1): ba'i bre dang / lnga ze rin po che'i byi ru dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od zer snang bas yongs su bAka ba dang / 'di lta ste rin po che'i shi la'i snang ba dang / rin po che'i la'i bre dang / 
68b3(1): bre kha zas nam po'i ro mchog sna tshogs kyi yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gyi sna dang / tsan dan gyi bre dang / lnga bre lha rdzas lta bu'i gos thugs kyis yongs su bkang ba
68b4(1): dang 'di lta ste rdo rje'i snod dang / rdo rje'i bre dang / lnga bre spos rin pa che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di la sde snong sna tshogs dngos 'o bab tha dang pa'i
68b5(1): tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre du ma sna tshogs stsogs par bya ba tshad med pa nor gyi dbyig dang / dngul dang / gser byes yongs su bkang ba de dag yon gyi gnas bsam gyis
68b6(1): mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'bral lam/ dge ba'i khashes gnyen shin du dkon par sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems
68b7(1): raba'ang pon mchag thams cad la 'brel lam/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa shin du bstan pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'bral ba lam/ 'phags pa'i skyo bo la zhin du mas pa'i sems
69a1(1): kyis gang zag gi rnam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la 'bul ba 'am/ bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim bya ba'i sems kyis pa dang ma dgal sbyin
69a2(1): bar byed dam/ de dang de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs bsags pa dang / gangams ngag dang / bslab pa dang / 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gnas par brtson pas slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyi
69a3(1): ba'i gnas la 'bul lam/ sems can thams cad la zhi mi sdang ba'i mig gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing gtong ba'i sems kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang
69a4(1): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad rtsom zhing tshogs chen po grangs med pas 'gro ba thams cad
69a5(1): yongs su mi gtang zhing mi spang ba'i sems gshin du gnas te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang / yon gyi gnas thams cad rab tu gzung ba'i sems la gnas pas
69a6(1): baben pa dang / 'phongs pa spong ba rnams la snang sna tshogs dang / ze dang / lnga bre'i yo byad kyi tshogs rnams pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dedag sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtang ba'i tshe/ 
69a7(1): dge ba'i rtsa bdedag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran pa'i dbang pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yongs su pa dang ldan/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig tems
69b1(1): 'das pa'i skang thams cad bzung ba dang / blang ba dang / yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa med cing snod chad med pa'i snying po can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zang ma rgyun chung ba med pa
69b2(1): chos can du gyur te/ snod bzang po rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gang yang 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur to/ 
69b3(1): bla na med pa'i sdong rin po che lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dbyer med pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung
69b4(1): zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas/ rin po che'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams
69b5(1): cad dang ldan pa shin tu brgyan pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa la mos pa/ rnam par dag cing yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang 'byung
69b6(1): gnas su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i bsgribs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar gtugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs
69b7(1): su chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhog pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal bar byang chub
70a1(1): / sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi glus dgA yan lag gis chos bsnun pa yang dag par 'dzin
70a2(1): sems dang ldan par gyur te yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi sded du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad ches kyi
70a3(1): 'khor lo bsar bral gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos yongs su d+hi la skye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i sras bur gyur te/ de ban+de gshegs pa thams cadakyil bar g+hi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi
70a4(1): khams nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa gang bar byed pa shor ba'i snod gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci ris kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sem
70a5(1): dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pal smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir yongs su sde'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna tshogs dang / bdin dum dang / 
70a6(1): rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rje chad med bdag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu rnyed pa dang / b+h+ra ma dang / sted pa dang / dge ba'i bzhes gan dang / 'ag 'dun dang/ rang
70a7(1): sangs kyis ras sun pa'i gnas sna tshogs sbeng ma yin pa dang / phyogs gsams 'ongs pa'i gli chag sa tshogs dang / tshangs pa'i nga/ baben spang ba dpagatumed pa dang / byang sa/ 
70b1(1): sems dpa'i sgra zas te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid ches pas skabs phye ste 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smor lam dang / sbyin pa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang / 
70b2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems kyi sra bas shing stabs pa de dag la sbyin zhing gtong ba 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i shing rdu la rgyan gyis shAn tu mdzes par byas pa/ sbyir pa 'am/ 
70b3(1): gser gyi shing rta la dril bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khrol ba'i rgyar rin po che'i srad bu'i lI bkyo bsrir pa 'am/ be du r+ya'i shing rta la rin po che byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin du
70b4(1): spras pa/ sbran pa'am/ dngul gyi zhi rta la sha ni du dag pa'i gser rab tu bzang po'i dra bas g.yo gas shing rta cang shes la bcas pa'i/ rin po bye baM khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyan
70b5(1): ci klubs pa/ sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang / rgyar thams cad pu na sum tshogs pas brgyar cing glang po cang shes la bcas pa sbyin pa'ang// tsan dan gyi/ 
70b6(1): nga rdal rin po che'i dam pa sna tshogs kyis shin du sbas te rin po che'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ na cung brgya phrag stong zhon pa/ rgyun thams cad dang / rin po sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdug
70b7(1): phur su mtshogs pa/ skyes bcing shes paca stong du mas drang ba/ sbyin pa'am/ shel gyi shing na l-i rin po che du maMs kha dag rnam par 'byes pa shin du mdzes par byas zhing / 
71a1(1): nacung byeb khrig brgya snang grangs med pas yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i bla res yog par bris paN+Dal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis phyogs pa ni nas brgyan snu na
71a2(1): pa'am/ a swa gar pa'i zhing rdal rin po cher tshogs dums shin du mdzes par byas te/ sras sna tshogs dri zhim pos gdugs pa/ spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi b+ha ga pas rab tu byugs pa/ 
71a3(1): me tog girgyun thams cad kyis 'chal par bkang ba/ bu mo brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srid bu thogs te/ 'khrul pa med par drang ba sbyin pa 'am/ dritsam pa sna tshogs kyi shing / 
71a4(1): ras da gas sna tshogs kyi bI bres pa/ rin po che'i dra bas yog par khyebs pa/ spos nim po yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa mi 'thun pa med pa/ tsher na dga' ba shin du 'thul ba mtshams
71a5(1): kyi lha'i bus dring ba/ rin po che'i 'khor lo rin po che thams cad kyis shin du brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ sbyin pa 'am/ rin po che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rda la kha tog
71a6(1): rnam pa sna tshigs su snang ba'i rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyun gyis brtan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dri ba'i sa b+hA res zos pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba mtha' yas kun nas sbyangs pa la bud/ 
71a7(1): dumo bsnyen pa/ smyos sna tshogs kyi bems mtha' 'khor shin du sbyangs pa/ sbyin pa byed pa na de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'di na 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i'adi
71a8(1): yongs su n-i/ sems can thams cingasas rgyas la yang na tshang med pa 'dul bar dang cing / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pal zhin du mos par gyur cig/ sems can tham/ 
71b1(1): cad ston pa'i gnas mtha' 'as pas rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas la rab tu chen par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtod brgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams ca/ 
71b2(1): la yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi smor lam dang bral te/ 
71b3(1): sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon ta thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shing du mos shing sangs rgyas la yor gsol
71b4(1): bzang mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cingad ye shes kyi mchog la rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
71b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob ste/ gang du dga' bar 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khod pa
71b6(1): 'grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te/ bsod nams kyi zhing dam par
71b7(1): b+hAr TIg/ sems can thams cad dgo ba'i rna ba thams cad bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga' ba med pa'i sems su
71b8(1): b+hair li/ sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du dal
72a1(1): med par zhugasate/ sas rgyas kyin thams cad yongs su bsgrub bskur gyis chub bang rgya ga/ sems canathams ca grangs rgyas skye ba 'ang nga chung tsu pas
72a2(1): chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas nam mkha'i dmigs thus cang dushin du rnam par bye ba si lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas dpe med pa'i lus rab tu thub bsangal zhing dub pa red
72a3(1): par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bying mi ldog pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan ming lus kyi maphyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
72a4(1): cad sems skad cig gcig gis bsam pa dang / khams khyab par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'bral pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi
72a5(1): rlabs dang / khyu mchog gi mtha' 'byin pa'i phyi rol du phyin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab tu brtson par gyur cig
72a6(1): sems can thams cad spobs bcu'i yi shes thams cang ma lus pa'i nathug pas 'aza bar thab ngas/ shin du srung ngu 'gro bar gyur rdzog/ sems can thams cang chos kyi byings thams cad tumeng nga bar 'jug pa
72a7(1): kyi las ma sam kyi pa ba gyu /  sa pa sa sa na gyi nga su ma
72b1(1): dpa' kun du bzang bar spyang pa khang durung ba'i b.ral dubyi pathab bas 'ad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos cing thams cad kyi rjes smra sang ning chos ji lta ba bzhir du mthong bas 'ang mang ba'i ma
72b2(1): kyi tshul thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon du gyur pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la
72b3(1): shing rta 'bral ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'i bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba'i mthar phyin par yongs su snga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
72b4(1): dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i
72b5(1): drin mi gtong ba'i phyir dge ba'i gshes gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems stor ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skal pa mnyam pa'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen
72b6(1): dang don 'thun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtong ba dang yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim 'gros
72b7(1): cher brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rtse bar byas te sbyang ba bsgrubs pa'i phyir bsam pa ge ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshe
73a1(1): gnyen dang 'thun pa'i bsnyen bkur la nan tan byed pas bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrul pa med cing nyams pa med
73a2(1): pa dang / 'dres pa med cing rlog pa med pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la grol ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yo byad ci 'dod rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen
73a3(1): la lus yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan ning 'khon med par rim gro byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig/ 
73a4(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun du mthun pa yang dag par mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam gcig pas byang chub sems
73a5(1): dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung ba dang / stobs kyi mthar gtug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang 'thun zhing gcig par gyur cig/ sem
73a6(1): can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon par shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin du byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams
73a7(1): cang badrang ba'i byor b.ral tu phyin pa'i mang btugs pasa'ang spang bar rig pa'i ba rar byin pazab par gyur cig/ sems ca thams cad thamam cang rdzogs med pa'i theg pam thams ca
73b1(1): mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad
73b2(1): shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med pas chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon
73b3(1): par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid dang
73b4(1): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dpe med pa rab tu thob pas mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba
73b5(1): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po 'atul ba la rab tu zhugs pas 'gro zhing ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i mthar
73b6(1): thugs gti mug med par 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa med pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig
73b7(1): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad
74a1(1): sas rgyas dang / byang chub sems papa 'a thams cad la tshul gyi chung bcag tu gyur bas bskye nga bgrang ba yangs su bsgrub pa ma pa ga par bya ba'i byong masasu
74a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin du brlabs pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyis shin du rtags pa'i mam bcan yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i ying dang ldan pa 'thun
74a3(1): par yangs su gtang ba'i bsam pams/ dge 'du rin pa che shin dung ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshanas ring ba chel ni rnams pa'i rnamam cam stan parab tu bzung ba'i ying dang ma reg
74a4(1): ba'i bsam pa zhin du bstan pa'i bsapa ba can dmi gro byed bdang ldan pa/ mtshad sbyin che ba'i mchod tshum ni du byas pa banan pa'i mnam chen brjong ba/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma mangs
74a5(1): bdags la cung drug pa med par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun na mtshag la shing 'bral ba/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing bral ngas yang dag par bzung ba'i ngage da na bdedag 'dis
74a6(1): yangs su sa sa/ dge ba'i rtsa pa 'dis sems canathams sangs sa rgyas kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzhol ba'i yang dag pang zi bar gyur // sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i phyi mtshad lal
74a7(1): gan med pa zhin du nub pas sems nang du gnol bar gyur ga/ sems can thams cad sas rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu brdung bas yang dag par bzung bas 'phags par red par gyur cig/ sems
74b1(1): can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du drang bas chags bzeng ba
74b2(1): depe'i dbyings la yang dag gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpe'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par byung bas cad shes kyis kun nas bskor bar gyur cig
74b3(1): sems can thams cad che ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sas pra
74b4(1): na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab tu brjod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin du brtson pa'i chos can du gyur te/ 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par
74b5(1): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
74b6(1): bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par shin du 'gro ba'i
74b7(1): 'jas la mkhas pas sems na cig gis rngu 'phrul btub ba par byar byig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi bams pams cad du thags pamed pa'i ye shes dang lda ning dam pa'a' la bu'i
75a1(1): lus kyi shing rta bsgrub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings mthas gtugs par khyab par
75a2(1): byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang du
75a3(1): dga' bar 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang dag pa'i khyad par rjes stogs par ba thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yang dag par ston pa'i phyir
75a4(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa la 'khor bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa med par 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
75a5(1): khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mig g.yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
75a6(1): cad la mi gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dus la ji ltar 'bab par sems can yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul
75a7(1): kyi khyam chog gi ma thu byung ba yang dag par stod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sang cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems nang kyi
75b1(1): gis phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun la shing rta 'bral zhing yongs su gtong ba'i yang dga'
75b2(1): bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i
75b3(1): ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i
75b4(1): rim gro can zhes dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
75b5(1): la rnam par sos pa/ mthu chen por skyes pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrim brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus brjod du med pa thams cad
75b6(1): du spyod pa rnam par sbyang ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad las sems rab tu grol ba// bdud du ma'i sde dang / bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab tu 'jom pa'i sems
75b7(1): dang ldan pa/ gzhal du med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sdang bar gyur pa de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bral ba'i tshe/ shing ta yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i
76a1(1): @rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su snga ste/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa yongs su smin pa'i grub pas sbyir ba'i gnas kyi dam par yid ches par gyur cig
76a2(1): sems can thams cad gcig tu sbyong zhing mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro po thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsdu
76a3(1): bal brtson pas sbyin pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab tu gtong bas ye shes kyi mu stegs las byung bar gyur cig
76a4(1): sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog gis rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa med par
76a5(1): khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas/ bsod nams cad
76a6(1): phreng ba shin du bsags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su brus te pan 'dags pa rnam par dag pas che 'phrul mtha' las pas rnam par ral pa yang dag par smon par rgyur cig/ 
76b1(1): cang mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyur te// sbyin pa'i gnas dor yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'dzin cing ldog pa'i chom
76b2(1): rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rigs sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs
76b3(1): rgyas thams cad las thos pa rjes su spags pa'i chos can du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhugs pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi
76b4(1): lta ba las rnam par 'das te/ bstan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mchog rnam par spel bar byed cing / 'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob
76b5(1): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing ye shes kyis spyod pa'i gang zag la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjes
76b6(1): su thos pa las byung ba'i thos pa don yod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bstan pa la rab tu bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa
76b7(1): rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsal bar bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pas chos thams rung zos pa shin du 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems ca thas
77a1(1): @cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bang spyod cing gtang ba shin du byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin du byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa pur
77a2(1): sum tshogs par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis ye shes dang mngon par
77a3(1): parnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu thob cing ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sde'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub
77a4(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang / slong ba 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra
77a5(1): thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems bskyed pa'i mos shing bstabs pa thams cad gtong bas shin du re ba'i yid can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas/ spong ba la rim gro bya bas mi 'ong
77a6(1): ba'i sems kyis slong 'ongs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar ngag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyed kyi drung du song ste rim gro bya ba zhig na/ nga 'di ltar khyed 'dir byin te/ shin du ngal bar
77a7(1): gyur bzhes sgribs btung nge bathong pa gsol bas/ blang ba thams car bzang bar byas/ rim sa byas ngal bsngos nas/ ci 'ad pa'i sbyin pa de dag gis shin du rim ma byed // bde ltar ning bu'i
77b1(1): shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling gi na cung bzang mo ri ba ches yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste gser rgya shing rta yul gyi shing ta yul gyi nacung rin po che shin du rngam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste be na
77b2(1): shing na rdung ma'i 'khor glu dang / rol mo gdung zhing dkrol ba'ang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi shing rta shin du mdzes pa/ bud med gzhon nu lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs su gang ba dang / 
77b3(1): 'di lnga ste rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cang shes rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su gang ba dang / 'di la ste can
77b4(1): ngan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' gzhon par 'ongs pa dang / 'di lta ste shel gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo bzhin bzang ba cha byang sdug gu shin du brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa lta na sdug cing mi 'thun pa med pas
77b5(1): yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste a spu gar ba'i shing rta dbang bskur bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste sras dam pa'i shing rta bra mos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rin pa che'i tshogs thams cad
77b6(1): kyis brgyan pa'i shing rta nang gi bshes gnyen dbyer mi byed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs med pa rnam pa sna tshogs spongs mo pa thams cad la spyir zhing yongs su gtong bas slong ba
77b7(1): 'dong bar bya ba'i dngos por 'du thob pas yid la bsam pashin du rdzogs nas/ spong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang bar bzung ste/ shin du tshim par byas shing bsam brdzogs
78a1(1): par byas nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sdog// sems can thams cad byang chub
78a2(1): kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pas 'gro ba dang ldan te/ theg pa chen po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
78a3(1): thams cad la spyod cing / pha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par phyir mi ldog pas chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i rlom sems med cing thos
78a4(1): cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la/ brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro
78a5(1): bal brtson pas kun du 'gro ba dri ma med pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg
78a6(1): pa'i shing rta rjes su 'thur pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid
78a7(1): dang lda zhing / byang chub sems pa'i srung ba rdib par dag pa'i shing nga la gon par gyur // sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yul na gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyes blangs mdo'irjer pa thams
78b1(1): sngon byas pas bsod nams shin tu bsags pa dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam la shin du brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyad pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa bran sum tshogs
78b2(1): pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta non par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang / ye shes la brtson 'grus pas phyogs thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings su
78b3(1): su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la brlabs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
78b4(1): phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang bde ba yang dag par ston pas bsod nams thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang / chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig/ sem
78b5(1): can thams cad 'ardungs pa'i dri ma rab tu byung ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pas tshul khrims rnam par dag
78b6(1): pas 'gro tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pa med pas gnas pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsam
78b7(1): ba 'khrugs pas med cing bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par byer cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas sring po byang chub du 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas btsun
79a1(1): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin du mgyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub du byung ste/ bsamasan
79a2(1): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rta la shin du zhon zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sprul pas rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab tu
79a3(1): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos yongs su btong ba la 'jigs med pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du sbyin pa btong ba'i phyir chos kyi
79a4(1): rgyal po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa/ rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi
79a5(1): shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po ma nor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shing rdul
79a6(1): zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung po'i smon lam skyo ba med par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin
79a7(1): bse so la dzin par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 'i dzin pa sbyin pa'i gnas dang / yin pa dang / spong bas tshigs la shing rta bad pa'i bdang / ra dag
79b1(1): dang mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa gron pa shin du bsgrubs pas/ ye shes drang sem
79b2(1): kyi rnam pa mthar yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// / bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po che ca
79b3(1): shes yan lag bdun shing du gnas pa lo drug bcu lon pa/ mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ kha dog pad+ma lta bu gdong rnam par dag pa dkare bzhing dri ma med pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi rgyad dang
79b4(1): ldan pa/ gser gyi drabs lus kun nas g.yogs pa/ sna rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan du bcug pa/ gser ltar lhan mdzes pa/ dpag tshad stong gis khyon du ngal ba med par 'gro ba sbyin
79b5(1): zhing gtong ba 'am/ rta cang shes gos pa zo 'dog bde bar 'dor zhing 'deg pa dang / bya ltar mgyogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdog ma lcang lor 'khyil ba/ nab tsong dang rmig par ldan pa/ rlig pa'i'o
79b6(1): dbyibs mtho zhing skyon med pa/ gser gyi dril bu dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba dang ldan pa/ blo kun nas brgyan pa/ rin pa re sna tshogs kyi gdong rgyan
79b7(1): gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gnon na bde ba/ lus la byas pa/ shin du mgyogs pa/ phyogs bzhing yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ lA rdzas lta bu'i lha ba lbu ba thams cad dang
80a1(1): ldan pa de lta bu bla ma'i skye bo dang bla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pa dang ma dang / phongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dang / len pa'i 'gro ba tham
80a2(1): cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can yangs pas sbyin pa dang / sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang / rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen po
80a3(1): yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pa'i gtong ba chen po rab tu gtong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu rtsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su mngon par skyes pa'i bsam
80a4(1): ba yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste/ cang shes kyi theg pa rab tu gnas
80a5(1): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyis theg pas byung ste/ theg pa bzang po'i zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
80a6(1): bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi theg pas snang bar gyur te/ theg pa chen po la shin du mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab tu zhugs pas brtsams pa chen pa
80a7(1): rig pa nga ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cing dge pa'i rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par byab tubapi pal paral tu phyin pa'i theb par rnam pa cad kyis byung bar gyur
80b1(1): cig sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes rin po ches sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin du 'byung ba'i chos can du gyur te/ theg pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can
80b2(1): cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rgyud du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i brgyan rnam par bsags pa'i theg pas shin du byung bar gyur cig/ sems can
80b3(1): thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te/ bskal pa grangs mong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba rjes su bsam pa/ rjes su sems shing rnam par
80b4(1): spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pas/ longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cang shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin
80b5(1): ba byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi mthar du gas par mngon par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po shin du mtho bar gshegs shing rab tu bsgon
80b6(1): pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' glang po cing shes dang / rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
80b7(1): can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyon zhing ye shes kyi banon pa yongs su grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med pas 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yod
81a1(1): su bsku'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por gyur pa/ chos kyi dbang byed pa'i san gyi sbyin pa byed cing
81a2(1): rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri san bzang po becu 'i gang gang banan seng ge'i khri la gnas pa/ gser gyi rgyu dang rin po che'i dra bas klungs pa/ sAr reg na bde ba grangs med pa du ma
81a3(1): bting ba/ na kor spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyis shin du dri zhim par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs rgyal marnyan bsgreng ba rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya song du ma'i rgyan gyis / 
81a4(1): pa gser gyi dra ba'i b+ha re zes pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dbas 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ongs pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba rin po che'i 'bra bre ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus gar nas
81a5(1): rnam par bye bas shin tu 'phags shing ldan mdzes pa/ sog chags bye re khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par kun nas blta ba/ gdugs ka bcig gis sa chen po thams cad stong pa
81a6(1): dbang bkar ba/ b+hal sa kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i spyan du ba ba de la 'dug hUM / 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bsgreng ba dang / mchis bya la rgyal po'i bka'
81a7(1): mamal pa med pa na pa/ rab shes par snang ba dag mi dza mi / ri ba ni gyi che'i ming pas mas pa/  la dang / zla ba~M dag/ sang bachengs pa rab tu brgyam / 
81b1(1): rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa/ rin po khyad par du 'phags pa rgya mtsho sa smras pa/ rgya mtsho dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga'
81b2(1): ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gyim bag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bkab pa de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi bdag po sbyin
81b3(1): nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ byams pas dbang bskur ba/ pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa/ dka' la zlog pa med pa/ 'dug
81b4(1): na dga' ba/ de lta bu'i bstan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri bstan bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu'i
81b5(1): sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la gsol pa 'am/ skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dkon/ 
81b6(1): mchog gagum/ chos sna pa'am/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir yongs su g.yog pa'i sems kyis sam/ pha dang / ma dang / bla ma'i skye bo'am/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas sam/ byang chub sems
81b7(1): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten mchod pa'i phyir ram/ phongs pa dang / bkren pa stong pa dpag tu med pa dag gam/ sems
81b8(1): can thams cad la phan bdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste/ sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// dge
82a1(1): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis semapa can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin du byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
82a2(1): can thams cad bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang / dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad tu thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i snyan rab
82a3(1): tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar 'os shing / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la
82a4(1): chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyir snyan gyi rgyan dang / 'khor lo rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas
82a5(1): khams sum pas zil gyis mi gnon pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs mong bar sangs rgyas kyi gdun gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa med pa dang ldan
82a6(1): cing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus
82a7(1): kyis rgyas par byed ba'i phyir gter chen po'i tshigs kyi snyan pa gnas par gyur cig / sems can thams cad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim 'gro byed
82b1(1): ba'i phyir rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan la rab tu thob par bya cig// sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas
82b2(1): khyu mchog gi mthu chung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'chang rgya zhing / de bzhin
82b3(1): gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang / khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / spos thams cad kyi stan dang / me tog thams cad kyi stan dang / 
82b4(1): gos thams cad kyi stan dang / 'phreng ba thams cad kyi stan dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / bai dur+ya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brjod du
82b5(1): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa'i stan dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa'i stan dang / rdo rje'i gdan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sem
82b6(1): dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i byang chub kyi stan rab tu 'thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par
82b7(1): 'chang rgya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing / dbang phyug gi lus la dgab pa'i gdugs rin pa che'i rgyan chen pos shin du brgyan
83a1(1): ba/ bye zag cig bcu sna b+ha snar du bas shing dbyung ba'i yo byad dud byung rin pa chen pa can dz+wal bu'i dbus kun nas bsku rang/ rin sa
83a2(1): brus ga se dz+hal buM'i sgrangs pa'i sgyu byung ba/ rin po che myor 'bru ba rab tu spangs pa rje 'phre nas ji spyi'i dbungs med du'o shi'i 'byung ba/ gser bye za ba rnam par dag
83a3(1): phyi g.yogs shing ban+d+han / rin che'i rlabs brgya dgu sbyong gau d+hA'i blos / nor bu rin po che'i 'brubrangs med pos smras pa/ pa rje bye ba phrag khrig brgya snang dums sa
83a4(1): tshogs su shing brgyan po/ a ba du dang / nang na dang / sras kyi dam pa sna tshogs bye ba brag brog brgya sri dmas kor dri zhim par bskus shing gdugs pa'ajam bu'i nu klung gigs
83a5(1): ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pas rgyan pas de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag pa na ma tho ba med pa'i sems kyi
83a6(1): sa byin pa byed cing / sems can gyi gtso bo mngon 'gyur ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir ram/ chos btsal ba'i phyir
83a7(1): sa semasas ga mags mas sems sa sa sa pa rgya ma/ sa
83b1(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'am sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi theg pa 'grub pa 'am/ de la zhugs pa dag gam/ 
83b2(1): bongs pa dang / bkren pa sring ba dang / len pa dag la 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems
83b3(1): can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad g.yog pa rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par g.yog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyan mongs pa dang / 'a ba'i nyon mongs
83b4(1): pa thams cad yongs su 'das te yon tan dang ye shes kyi sa mngon par bkab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi rdul dang mun pa dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par
83b5(1): 'das te/ lus shin du bkab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du gyur cig/ sems
83b6(1): thams cad sadang rgyas kyi chos la log pa med par 'jug par brtson pas ma khugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin du bka' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
83b7(1): s+yA sa snga t+ta ng+tha p+'u p+pa m+b+hi s+yem+b+ha sgra can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob par gdug su ring bar gyur cig/ sems cani/ 
83b8(1): thams cad pas gsu ma thams cad las shin sags shing tshig pa mi pa'i mi shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas mi shes kyis rnam par snang bar byung oM/ sem can rnam thang tshu ba gnas dam pal ban rnams
84a1(1): thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs su 'os par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs kyi rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi
84a2(1): dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung ba/ 
84a3(1): thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// gdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' gdugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas
84a4(1): thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su snga'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs gcig gis rgyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
84a5(1): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// gdugs dang / rgya mtshan dang / ba dan yid du 'ongs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas
84a6(1): kyi ning thams cad ma lus par gdugs kyi rgyan gyis kun du log par bya ba'i phyir yongs su smra'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtsham la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad
84a7(1): gdugs rmad kyis dga' pa'i phyir yongs su snga'o// ri ba chethams cad kyi gdugs sde nags brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas sangs rgyas gcig la bral bas/ sangs rgyas thams
84b1(1): la brjod du med pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shing yongs su sngar// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags pa'i gdugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dag pa pa'i phyir longs
84b2(1): su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad la gdugs kyis dga' ba'i phyir yongs su
84b3(1): bsngo'o/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba brgyus shing klubs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi mchog gi dri zhim po 'dad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / 
84b4(1): rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par sbas pa'i gdugs dang / rgyar mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan tshang med par yangs shing rgya che ba dang / gser gyi dra bas kun nas g.yog par
84b5(1): brgyan pa/ dril bu'i dra bas kun nas sbyang ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing sbyin pa 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / ye shes bsgribs pa med cing chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon
84b6(1): bar dga' ba'i gdugs yongs su gtong ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sem
84b7(1): can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dag pa pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas g.yogs shing rab tu brgyad pa'i phyir yongs su sngar/ 
85a1(1): @sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang yon tan dang / dgongs pa dam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sde'o// sems rin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob par phyir
85a2(1): yongs su snga'o// chos thams cad la ye shes kyi dbang sbyar ba kun du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par g.yog par yongs su sngo ba'i don du yongs su sngo'o// 'a
85a3(1): bathams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcus bla rer bres pa'i gdugs su gyur para'i bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngal
85a4(1): chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis g.yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sdog// chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu dbang sgyur ba'i dbang pob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// mthu chen po
85a5(1): dang dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// yon tan chad med pa 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dag
85a6(1): pa'i phyir yongs su snga'o// yon tan thams cad kyis sems mngon par dgrugrab pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su sde'o// ye
85a7(1): gis rjen pa brimasam par dag pa bathob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngal// sems can thams cad kyis sngo ba'i tshul lus pazab par bya ba'i phyir yangs su sngal// sems dang bsam pa rnam pa dag par
85b1(1): 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// bsam pa dge ba dang yid kyi rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sngo bachen pos mngon par dag bcing yang dag par sa
85b2(1): ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang bang na rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba can rin po che'i dril bu'i dri ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du'ang
85b3(1): ba 'byung ba/ sna bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spangs pa/ kha dog dang tshon sna tshogs kyi sna bus brgyan cing bsgreng ba gser gyi dra bas kun nas sbyangs shing klubs pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba
85b4(1): dril bri g.yer ka'i dra bas shin du brgyan pa rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa/ mtshon tha dad pa shin du mtho ba/ rin po ches rnam pa sna tshogs su rgya pa/ rgyal
85b5(1): mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcug pa 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sa thams cad kun du log
85b6(1): nga rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam pa du ma 'ong dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng ba'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal
85b7(1): mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun du khyab par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byam klas pa la gnas pa/ yangs
86a1(1): pabyang du rnam paran gyi sbyin pa yangs su gtang bar mos pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngas pa dang / 
86a2(1): thel pa'i khyad par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas papa mi ldan 'das mngon du myur ba rnams la 'bral ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su myang na las 'das pa gyur rten napa/ rnam sa
86a3(1): mtshag mchod pa ma/ dge 'dun pon mchog la 'bul 'am/ dge ba'i bzhes garten byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ 'khor gyi chags su
86a4(1): gyur ba'am/ gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung ste/ spong ba thams cad la rim thong bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtong na/ rgyal mtshan dang / bdan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
86a5(1): dedag 'di ltar yongs su 'i/ dge ba'irtsab 'das sems can thams cad me shes kyi rgyu la martan dang / bangan la thug pa med pas dge pa'i na pa dang / bsod rnams thams cad med dag par bsnyed pa
86a6(1): rgyal ma can can du gyur na// sems can thams cad rgyas kyig 'bang bris paskyed pa'i chos ying kyis chos thams cad la dbang snang ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thamasas sangs rgyas
86a7(1): kyi pa lang nga tsham tha/  bsas sa rgyas kyabs bris pa nga nga bya mas ca thams ca 'tha bcan pam me dang ba
86b1(1): rgyal mtshan shin du 'phags par gyur cig/ sems can bdud thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i chas
86b2(1): can du gyur te/ ye shes dang stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad mi ltung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te/ ye shes mthu bo che'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig
86b3(1): sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye shes kyi nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem
86b4(1): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la brtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu sgreng bas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan
86b5(1): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyi dben zhing sems 'dod chags bral bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur
86b6(1): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang
86b7(1): zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing so so yang dag par rig pa
87a1(1): rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang / sem
87a2(1): can thams cad nor gyis phyag par byed pa dang / rin po'i che'i mdzod thams cad 'byed pa dang / rin po che'i gtor thams cad gtong ba dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nor bu
87a3(1): rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang / rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad phongs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang / rin po rje'i
87a4(1): tshogs thams cad mthong ba dang / rin po che thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la rin po che sbyid pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i
87a5(1): rtsa bde dag 'di ltar yongs su sngoste/ sems can thabs ca ngan pa'i rgyud rmongs pa med cing / sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ 
87a6(1): chos dkon pachog gi snang bar ba tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong bzhin du brtan pas dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can
87b1(1): bamed par gnal bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin pa che chad med pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yan 'a'adzi pa che grangs
87b2(1): med pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'tshang rgya bal brtson pas/ yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i sngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig
87b3(1): sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che shin du yangs pa'i mthar thug pas ye shes rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug par rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
87b4(1): rin po che la rnam pa sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu ston pa la gyon pas ring
87b5(1): po che'i dbang po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rnam par
87b6(1): dag tsang nyams pa med pas ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang yan lag dang / nying lag tham
87b7(1): cang rgyar gyis shing du dran pa lus san sgrub pa/ rnam par dag cing mi 'thur pa med pa'i rgyan gyis lus shin du brgyan pa rin pa chethams cad kyis rab tu brgyad pa rin pa che'i rgyan sna chags rnam patha pa
88a1(1): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin du rgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig rten gyi
88a2(1): bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad spobs pa/ dga' ba sna chags kyis sems can rab tu dga' bar byeng ba/ de rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thadang ba dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin
88a3(1): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgong ba'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i rtse/ rgyun yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sun/ 
88a4(1): sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu ring bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing mtshan
88a5(1): gyis lus shin tu brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can du re nga lus mtshan gyis shin du d+han pir gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus
88a6(1): kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgya pa dang ldan ning lus mtshan gyis shin du rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan cing
88a7(1): tshig gi rgyan gyis shin du brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams ca dbyangs kyi yan lag yong du'ong shing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / yo tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur rtag/ sems
88b1(1): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig gi tshul rnam par dag pas 'gro ba kun 'gu bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cin// sems
88b2(1): thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jug cig sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos snang ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu thob cing gzugs
88b3(1): thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin du brgyan pas sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar
88b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rgyan de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye
88b5(1): shes kyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs te/ sems can thams cad kyi ris nang rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88b6(1): chen po dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cod pan dang / gtsug gis rin po che'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / mngon par stobs pa dang / sem
88b7(1): can 'ams ca la bar 'dags pa dang / ltos pa med par yongs su gtong ba'i sems rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / sbyin pas bsgos pa'i rlung yongs su bskam pa dang / sbyin pa la ba
89a1(1): bsgyur bar rab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu slob pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i dbang yongs su skyed pa dang / sbyid pa gtong ba'i blo rgya chen byed
89a2(1): pa'i che cong pa na dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sangs
89a3(1): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ dbang po thams cad la shin du dbang bskur bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas spyi bo bcu ga
89a4(1): can gyi mgo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar byin pas ye shes ring ba che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyur cig/ sems
89a5(1): can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing / ye shes rin po che'i mchog la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi snying pa la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob ste
89a6(1): ye shes kyi cong pan shin du bcings par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis lta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes kyi nor bu ring po ches mag rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ 
89a7(1): sems can thams cad spyi bong byung ba'i ye shes kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i chos can gyur to/ sgra ba shin du btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams car
89b1(1): shes napa rgyamatsha' tshang pa rnam par dag pa dang ldaman sapas bcu'i rgya chung pan byas ma ba tu brdzun pa / sems ra ga sa ca
89b2(1): par 'jom pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug ste/ chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad
89b3(1): mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis mi non pa'i snang ba rab tu thob ste/ rgyal po'i mchog dam par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pocod pa dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gang
89b4(1): ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi cod pa dang / nor bu rin po che rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar
89b5(1): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson rang bcug cing / mtshon chas bcings pa'i sems can sngags bsngal ba/ sdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba/ shing sgrog dang lcags
89b6(1): sgrog dang / lcang gi bcing bas bcings pas/ lus lcags tag gis btags pa/ sdom pa shin du rgyu ba'i lus can/ mi bde bas lus shin du mnar ba/ skyabs med par lhung ba/ bkres
89b7(1): bdang slob pas gnyen pa/ gas med pa mun pas yog cing khebs pa/ shin du dge ba brla' lcogs sreg gis baspobs pa de la bung ba mthong ma byang chub sems dpa' snying rdzirdzan dang / 
90a1(1): can de dag yongs su thar bar byed do// des bcan de nas sems can de ngagathar bar byas nas kyang nor gyi spyong pa thams cad mngon par byeng ngas/ sla dang / sman padzang / sngags kyi rnam pas lus
90a2(1): nad med par byas te/ bde ba dang yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas chos rin po che thos par byas te/ dga' ba'i gtan gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi bskur pa las mi nyams par byed
90a3(1): de de ltar sems can btson ra nas bkye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang zhags pa las
90a4(1): shin du grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin cing 'khor ba'i rgyu shin du chang par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gal nyal bzhin du bcom ste/ kun
90a5(1): nas 'khor ba dang / rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ming cog rnam par bskul cing / rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig/ sems ca
90a6(1): thams ca tho ba can da par bya ba'i yeseMs kyi mang chug par gyur / khams gsum pa'i bcom pathams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ semasasams sa sa pamed pa'i
90b1(1): ye shes bsgribs pa med pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing / nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad shin du shigs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rlob sems kyi g.yo ba rnam par rgyu ba/ thams
90b2(1): cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gzhol zhing g.yo ba dang / rlom sems kyis bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum
90b3(1): thams cad du chags pa med par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i btsangs pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa/ sangs rgyas
90b4(1): thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin du grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu sems chags pa med pa dang / 
90b5(1): grol zhing bcings pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / theg pa chen po dgod pa'i
90b6(1): phyir rnam par rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dong bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad
90b7(1): bcan dang / bconas bkye bas yang dag par 'azung ba'i rtsa bded pa sems can thams cad ni tung dzal zhing nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis la banas par 'gyur ba phyir 'ang
91a1(1): su s+dza 'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang dbral ba'i phyir gsang du khrid pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi bzang cing 'angang ba nga
91a2(1): bskas bcings bskye bo brgya brag glang gis kyi nas bskong cing 'jam bu'i gling du gtogs pa sna chags nas bshul zhing bkrig/ gan shes kyi d+hang dang / mja' ba'i rgyung thams cad dang bral ba byung ba/ 
91a3(1): ral gyis gtsab cing gsheg pa/ gsal shing bsgreng ba la bskyon pa/ lus thams cad kun nas klags te me 'bar ba'i nang du dong ba bam/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mi bde ba thams cad kyis mi 'de bar byab
91a4(1): gtse ba sna tshogs thams cad du bsgre zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong bar gyur na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gsang bar bya de'i don du lus yongs su gtong
91a5(1): ste/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi bam pa dang / rgyal po khyad par du 'gro bas ji ltar byas pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyang sems can gsad pa bru ba'i
91a6(1): nga dums sa nga chug pasngal gyi bathams ca mas tha le ba de ba du N+Da sa twA rtse nga cig 'di skad du smyan// khyed kyis ni da 'di ga nal rgyam ma/ sa ma
91b1(1): mi bde ba sna tshogs su gyis shig ces te/ 'di ltar bdag gis gsang ba papi pa mthong yang / bdag gi lus dang sreg gis mi blu ba ni bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra'// ci'i phyir zhen/ bdag gis na ma
91b2(1): can thams cad la dmigs te/ 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed do snyam nas/ bdag gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/ gsang bar bya ba de zlas nas dge ba'i
91b3(1): rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad gzhan gyi gtse ba sdug bsngal nye bar byung bas/ las dang srog shin du mi 'phrogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las
91b4(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub stobs bcur lung bstan pa'i gnas ba tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ngan song thams cad kyi lam las yongs su 'das te/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu mthar bar
91b5(1): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings su zhugs pas/ 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skabs rab tu rnyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i khashes gnyen de bzhin gshegs
91b6(1): bas yongs su bzung bas dgras 'jigs pa thams cad thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khan ma mtho ba med pa las dge ba thams cad spyod pas ral gyis gcab pa lta bu'i mi bde ba thams
91b7(1): cang las 'das par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing dam pa'i drung du phyin cing 'jigs pa med par bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas bag tsha ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad
92a1(1): dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad blan med pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pas rnam par ngag cing khyu mchog dang seng ge'i ngaro 'byin pas 'khor kyi 'jigs pa dang / bag chab tham
92a2(1): cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mkhan ma mtho ba med pa'i las la yang dag par spyod cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi nang na bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng ger gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
92a3(1): skye bo kun yongs su skyong ba'i sems dang ldan zhing 'gro ba kun du 'jigs pa med pa'i khang par zhugs par gyur cig/ ces de ltar gsang bar gyur pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus dang srog btang ste/ 
92a4(1): brus nas dge ba'i rtsa bde dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i btson nga'i sdug bsngal kun spang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su sde'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
92a5(1): sems dpa' chen po la mgo las bcu gapung dang / thor bag tu bcas pa brlabs ma/ rgyal po gtsugan rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' yan lag dam pa shin du 'phags pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub
92a6(1): sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du/ des slong ba de dag mthong nas gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge ba'i thor pag dang / gtsug pud du chos te/ khyer cig ces stobs shing kye tshur sheg/ bdag
92a7(1): ga lag zung sa mapa tu mas pamadzan sa sa byang chub sems dpa' 'angs bu'i rdzing na bachun padzi'i dang yangs kyi bci su byas / ming 'khrugs pa dang / nga
92b1(1): 'dres pa dang / las gnan la mi sems pa'i ying dang / 'jig rten las 'babs pa'i yid dang / rab tuni pa'i 'di dang / thams cad mabyed pasang kyi yang dang / drang ba'i tshang ngang/ 
92b2(1): la brtson pa'i yid kyis gtsug pung dang / thong pag tu bcas pa de spong ba la gtong ba'i tshe/ gtsug pung dang thor ba ga tu bcas par mtshan gyis phog ste/ mgo las pa gnas bus mod las rje
92b3(1): lha nga sa la bab ste/ rim gro dang bcas pa'i lus kyis sor mo sbyar nas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed
92b4(1): pa dang / dga' bas rnam par spel ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas de dag par mi mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang / sdug
92b5(1): bsngal gyi tshor ba skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / tha dad par khong du rung ba dang / tshor ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa de dag thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das
92b6(1): ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhan pa nyid du bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i
92b7(1): sems dang / byang chu ba sems pa'i spong bldag pa'i sam pa'i rnam pas thob pa gzhan gyis dring mi 'dug pas dge ba'i bshes gcen gyis bstan pa'i rdul la gnas te/ bcu ga pung dang / thongs
93a1(1): du bcas pas mgo las thogaste/ yongs su gtong ba'i ma dge ba'in bde da mar yongs su na/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug gi mdza
93a2(1): rten du gyur te/ gtsug tor ltar mi snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skra shin du phra ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal cing sgra rdo rje nag po'i dam pa lta bur gyur cig/ sem
93a3(1): can thams cad sgra sdug cing sgra mtshams legs pa dang / skad snum par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mgo legs pa las shin tu legs par skyes pa'i sgra rab tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ 
93a4(1): sems can thabs cad sgra dga' ba 'khyil ba la ltar g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing / dpal gyi be'u dang sgra dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par
93a5(1): 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i sgra thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par gi sba las 'od zer rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig
93a6(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bu shin du rnam par dag pa ltar sgra shin du mdzes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems mnyams shing sangs rgyas kyi dbusgra dang / dbul bur mdzes pa dang
93a7(1): ldan pa'i skyo bo la bzhag pa'i mad rted du'as pa'i spang san par gyur cig// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ra chags pa med pa'i snga mdzes par skyes pas mun padang / rdul gyi mi
93b1(1): gas pa dang ldan par gyur cag ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gtsug pung dang thar pag tu bcas pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge pa'i rtsa bde na sems
93b2(1): thams cad kyis sa ga bu ni duzhi pa'i sems yangs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stabs bcu'i mthas gtugs par bya ba'i bying mangs su so'o// 'di ltar mang na
93b3(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spong ba rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba byed pa dang / rgyal po zla'ang dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chang med pa gnan ngag gis gtang ba'i
93b4(1): mig yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / ye shes kyi mig yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo dang / chos snang ba rab tu thob pa'i yid kyi gnas dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa'i yid kyi rnam
93b5(1): pa dang mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i yongs su sngo ba dang / ye shes kyi skye mched la yang dag par btang ba'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / mnyam
93b6(1): bar byas pa'i sbyin pa dang / gtong ba'i sems dang zhe sdang ba med pa'i mig gis dang po rdzogs po'i dbang dang / slong ba'i rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan la gzhol bas
93b7(1): byang chub sa bas pa'i sems leg pa den pa dang / byams pa dang / sdong rje yongs su bskams pa dang / dbang badru bzhin du bslams pas spang brnams lami ga byin pa de bzhin du de yang mi
94a1(1): yongs su gtong shing chos de lta bu la zhugs pa'i sems kyis spong ba dang 'dod pa dag la sbyid pa byed cing mchod sbyir gyi don la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi mthuzhin du skyed pa
94a2(1): dngaH'jig rten thams cad kyi dga' bar lta ba dang / bag med pa'i sred pa rnam par bzlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs mthong bas rang gi dga' ba khong du chung par byed
94a3(1): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ba myong bar byed pa dang / ci bslangs pa'i dngos po kha mi stongs pa'i byed pa dang / mi gnyis sbyin pa'i rjes su srung ba dang / rlom sems med pas shin du sbyin pa yongs
94a4(1): su gtong ba dang / spong ba rnams kyis dngos po ci bslangs pa sbyir bar byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad
94a5(1): kyi mig tu gyur te/ mig gi dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin du yangs pas nyams pa med pa'i mig tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba mi 'bogs
94a6(1): padang ldan zhing sha'i mi'i rnam par dag pa yongs su grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shi 'bo dang skye ba shes shing lha'i mig rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin
94a7(1): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'dong zhing chos kyi mgor ba tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par ston pas shes rab kyi ma ga zab par gyur cig/ sems can pas/ 
94b1(1): cang chos thams cad mngon par 'chang rna ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rags pa med pa'i mig gi mthar thug ste/ kun du lwa ba'i mig dang ldan
94b2(1): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams yongs su shes shing rab rabi med pa'i mig dang ldan par 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs par byin
94b3(1): pas bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig yongs su gtong ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chad kyi mig gi ches sems can thams cad
94b4(1): yongs su bsngo ba la che bar 'god do// bar po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dza ltar rgyal po khyang par du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems
94b5(1): dpa' bdud pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gis yongs su btang ba bzhin du slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa blangs pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan
94b6(1): par gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'thun par skyes
94b7(1): ba dang / dbang po dang ye shes dang / yan tan gyis shin du btsun pa dang / khams gsum ma dag cing snying po med pa la snying po rab tu rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' blta b.rab tu
95a1(1): thob pas rang gi lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang / gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su drad par gnas pa dang / dul ba dang zhi ba'i sems dang / dbang po'i
95a2(1): rgyu bshin du zhi ba dang / 'gro ba'i mya ngan thams cad nas sems can thams cad gdon par sems pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyud ched du brjod pa'i rgya mtshos gtong ba'i sems
95a3(1): yangs par byas pa dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i chos dang / mgor po thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbang byug la ye shes kyis spyong ba dang / rang gi lus snying po ming pa las snying po blang ba'i blos yongs
95a4(1): su gang ba'i rmi/ rna ba dang sna yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bde 'di ltar yongs su su n+te/ dge ba'i rdzo ba 'dis sems can thams cad chom thams cad kyi sgra rnam par rig par bya ba la chags pa
95a5(1): red pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyis sgra thams cadas jilta pa bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snga dang ldan
95a6(1): bas rdzogs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rna pa'i sre ma ched shin du bsgoms pas rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad rnam par shes pa ni bskye ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i
95a7(1): rnam la rgya / sem pa ya sangs rgyas kyi gsu pang su 'byor/ sa kyi phyis pa 'anal pa'i dbang sa rabar bya ga/ sem pas las nga rna ma
95b1(1): rig par bya bar byir gnas pa med pa nab nga dran par gyur // semam ca thams ca byar nal pa 'jig par byed ba'i zhes pa la byingad pa'i ba dang ldar par byu // sems can thams da du ma run nam
95b2(1): dbang sgyur bas kun tu 'dug pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi stan rab tu thob par bya ba thob pas/ lha'i rna ba'i rab tu thob par gyur ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' semasangasas
95b3(1): chen pos rna ba yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi rna ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos nas/ sna rnam par dag par yongs su sngo ste/ sems can
95b4(1): thams cad legs par mtho ba'i sna dang / dpe byad bzang po'i sna dang / mtshan bzang po'i sna dang / shin du yid 'ong ba'i sna dang / rnam par dag pa'i sna dang / rim gyis gzhol ba'i sna dang / mdzes pa 'phags
95b5(1): ba'i sna dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i sna dang / ngo blta na sdug pa'i sna dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad ngol mi sdug pazed pa dang / 
95b6(1): / chos thams cad kyi dang / chags pa med pa'i nga dang / blta na sdug pa dang / mi 'thun pa med pa'i ngo dang / shin du rnam par dag pa'i ngodang / kha na mthob med pa'i ngo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyis
95b7(1): dkyil 'khor la bu'i nga dang / kun nas la ba'i ngongang / yid du'ang zhing chang med pa'i 'ang dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por pa dang sa yangs su btang bas yang dag par blda/ 
96a1(1): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang sems cad thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci ras kyang
96a2(1): sernams can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin du 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin du shes par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can tham
