96a3(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin du mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi
96a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo khong du chung bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin du zil gyis mi non pa'i yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
96a5(1): kyi chos thams cad la snang ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gnyis
96a6(1): pathams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyeng pa zil gyis mi non pa'i sal
96a7(1): gnas te/ ungam 'ba'ar gang shin dung ngan par sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang / gtong ba mi zad cing 'byam thas pa dang / dad cing drung srugs te gtang ba'i sems dang / yongs su gtong ba'i
96b1(1): blo mtha' yas pa dang / dul ba dang / yongs su dul ba'i yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang / gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i mtha' thug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor lam dang / bzab
96b2(1): thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gtong ba chen po dang / shin du gtong ba dang / rab tu gtong ba dang / mchog tu gtong ba'i sems kyis rang gi lus dang / yan lag dang / gtong gis
96b3(1): kyang ban 'dags pa dang / mi spong bar gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i chos la rab tu gnas te/ ji ltar rgyal ba me tog so dang / glang po'i rgyal po mche ba drug pas sa ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du rang gi lus dang / 
96b4(1): banas so yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod rten du mchod par 'os par gyur te/ mche ba dkar zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur phyin
96b5(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rab tu thob pas so mnyam zhing thags bzang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par zhugs shing dul ba'i sems kyis nye
96b6(1): bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdod gyi dkyil 'khor blta na sdug cing ba'i nang dang / sa rnam par dag par gyur cig sems can thams cad kha dang song pe med par rnam par dag cing bzhin dran pa'i brgyan gyis
96b7(1): brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gseb nas spos nim pa'i mchog grangs med pa yid du 'ong ba dga' ba skyed pa'i ngang 'byung bas yongs su dag cing so ni bcu chang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem
97a1(1): can thams cad shin du dul ba'i so rab tu thob cing / bkra shis dang / dga' ba'akhyil ba dang / bdam sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bris pa'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
97a2(1): thams cad gtong gi dkyil 'khor nas tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba 'byung bas/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad kha zas la ma chag
97a3(1): mazhen cing kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pas sbyin pa'i nas dam pa'i mthar thug par gyur te// so'i thigs legs shing 'bras chan kha bye ba lte bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam pa lung ston
97a4(1): cing so'i gse ba kun nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i so'i sbyin pa'i yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
97a5(1): can ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa nying du yang dag par bskyed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi chos thams cad zhes pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su snga'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
97a6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce baspangs na/ ji ltar rgyal po bzhin bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang skye ba'i skye mchod rnam
97a7(1): pa sna tshogs dag gnas shing char bas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de dang de dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa de bzhin du nges kyang slong ba de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i gdan dag la bkon cing spong ba
97b1(1): thos pa'i sems kyis yid du'ang zhing 'jam pa'i ngag dang / byams pa'i spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi lce gtong ba'i tshe/ gshe ba'i sems med pa dang / rma med pa'i sems dang / rnams pa med pa'i
97b2(1): sems dang / rigs chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod cing gzhag sems dang / rlung 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / mthu
97b3(1): stobs chen po'i shugs kyi sems dang / lugs ma chags pa'i sems dang / tshig tu brjod pa la chags pa med pa'i sems byas te/ pus po'i lhang sa la gcugs shing bdag gi kha nas lce byung ste/ lus thams ca
97b4(1): maspong ba dbang byed du bcu ga nas tshig gnyen ning 'jam pa dang / yid du'ang ba dang / byams par spyod pas tshig tu brjo cing / cinas kyang khyed dag zhing yid bde ba dang / mguning rangs par bdag gi mi 'angs
97b5(1): drang bas pa de'i dgas par sgrubs shig ces nas/ de lce sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ lce yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sem
97b6(1): can thams cad tshig gi tshul thams cad kyis shes par byed pa'i phyir/ lce shin du yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag paji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig bden gnyisas bya ba med pa dang ldan par byu
97b7(1): gtong gi dkyil 'khor khyebs pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phral pa yang dag par ston pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig
98a1(1): can thams cad ro bro ba'i mchog shin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing shin du srab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi tshig shes pas the tsam gcod pa'i phyir
98a2(1): nges pa'i tshig gis dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lce'i mdzod nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya rjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa'i byed pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas pa
98a3(1): byung ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshogs pi zad pas ston cing / brjod pas tshig shin du nges pa brjod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
98a4(1): thams cad spyod pa kun brjod pa chad med pa'i mdzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / smra ba thams cad rnam par 'brel ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem
98a5(1): can thams cad spyong pa'i rjes su brjod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang / tshig gi rnam pa shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa thams cad pas
98a6(1): par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad shin du ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
98a7(1): dmigs pa'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa de lce yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bdi dag sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes chags pa zed ba yongs su rdzogs par bye/ 
98b1(1): ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i mgo byang chung
98b2(1): khong du rud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mchog tshul gyi mgo dang ldan pa'i bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mgo yang dag par blta ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i mgo yongs
98b3(1): su bsgru bas ba dang / sa dam pa'i mag rjes su lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cing tshol ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bltang med pa/ ye shes kyi mgo'i rnga
98b4(1): pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / phyogs thams cad du phyin pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po'i mgo la mos par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zil gyis mi non pa'i mgo yongs su grub par byed cing de
98b5(1): lta bu'i chos la spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs su gtong ba'i tshul la brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos pa skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/ spong
98b6(1): ba mtha' yas pas dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa yid kyi dbang po shin du gsal ba/ rgyud rab tu ngang zhing sems dang yid shin du dang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/ 
98b7(1): byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa shin du rnache ba rgyur mi 'chang bar sems pa gtong brten pa gtang bshin du gtong bas gtang ba'i yid dang ldan pa dbang ba shin du dga' bas se bar brtan pa'i chos cams/ 
99a1(1): pa'i bsam pa yangs shing dgel rgyache bas sbyin pa gtong bar mngon par 'dod pa ji skang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang skyes bladas pa gang shi'i rgyal ba dang de ma yin pa'i byang chub sem
99a2(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang mgo yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mgo gtong ba'i tshe/ mgo yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar sems can thams
99a3(1): cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang / skye mched zil gyis mnor pa dang / zhing thams cad dri mngon par 'phags pa dang / bum pa rgyas pa dang / dag
99a4(1): ba 'khyil bdang / spang nga mga'i 'od dang / 'ang zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du drang dbyung ba dang / dal gyi be 'us brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang / 
99a5(1): gdags par budang / 'thob thams kyi ba tu pa lag dang ldan pa / ragad pa ga nga chen kyi kyil 'a'ang gyimag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bying ma mamasmi/ 
99a6(1): ba gyi mas su rdzal/ 'ang gar yang byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen pa spong ba mam sa pa'i lag papa pa 'thab dang / ban 'das pa'i tshul dang / rnam myong pa la bcad par 'al ba ma
99b1(1): nga nub tsha'i labamams par 'thabs lag pa gang bdang / byung bang na mang bar byang chub sems pa'i las sa byung ba lag pa ni su brkyang dang sang ba'i sems pa la nungs dang / ba da pa'i
99b2(1): shin du nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis spyod cing lag pa yangs pa gtong ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul gyi gzhi chen por btu bta pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
99b3(1): yid ma dang / tshor bas mnyam pa'i blo dad pa dang / 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba las phyir ldog pa'i 'gro bas byang chub du 'byung bas/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / rgyal po dga' lngar dang / 
99b4(1): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan chad med pa dag kyang skyes pa'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing lag pa yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems yangs shing rgya cho
99b5(1): bcang med bapa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur pa chos kyi rgyud kyi sgonam par bye ba/ 'jig rted gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gtang ba'i lag pa dang ldar pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yang
99b6(1): chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i smon lam can/ sems bskyed brdal med pa dang 'grogs pas kun nas bskor ba med pa ye shes dang chos kyi lus rgyud mi 'chang ba/ mi shigs pa mi chong pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 
99b7(1): bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi skal ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nye bar brtan pas sems spel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spyad pa dang / gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong bas byung ba de spong
100a1(1): @#ba la rkang lag gi sbyin pa byed cing / yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ thams cad bakhyen pa zhing da dmigs
100a2(1): te nang lag yongs su gtang ba yongs su byin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtsa bcu yod pa de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la yongs su snga'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi dang bzab cing rin
100a3(1): po che'i lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag rin po che'i lag pa des sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu thob ste/ phan tshun gyi la rin po ches 'thor bar gyur cig/ mngon par 'thor
100a4(1): bar gyur cig/ rab tu 'thor bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyang phan tshun du zhes pa
100a5(1): med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig// de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su dong zhing 'jigs pa med pa la gnas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir
100a6(1): mas cad lagan rin pa tshi legs pa / srag dgras thags padang / laganags thags pa dang / lag na gdugs segs pa dang / lagan 'phreng bzags pa dang / las ma gathamasapa
100a7(1): gan bya thags padang/ mganas su gags pas pa mas ma mas pa mags pa grub/  nga pa pa sa dang / ra sa
100b1(1): mchong bar brtson pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / 
100b2(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi lag pa mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'i lag pa dang / 'od zer gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad lag mthil gcig gi yog par byed pa dang / dra bar
100b3(1): 'brel cing sen mopo zangs ltar 'dug pa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis phyag shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par byed pa'i byar cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin
100b4(1): tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / khas len pa'i ngang tshul dang / spong ba thams cad la mngon par mos shing 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / dad pa chen po rab tu thob pa dang / 
100b5(1): slong ba'i bong par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas rkang lag yongs su gtong
100b6(1): pa byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshal ba'i tshe/ rkang lag yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar thams cad gtong ba'i don du yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang
100b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsam pa dang / sems dang ying du ldan pa byang chub kyi sems kyis rab tu dga' ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba la mngon par dang ba'i se
101a1(1): dang ldan pa tshor bas dengs par mi 'byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ spong ba thams cad la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ len pa thams cad la ne mi snang ba
101a2(1): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtong ba'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtong bas sbyin par bya ba'i rjes su srung ba'i sems
101a3(1): dpa'i sbyin pa rgya chen pos btang ba shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sems rgyun mi 'chang ba dang ldan pa/ bdag gi lus la phangs par mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de ji ltar byang chub
101a4(1): sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyal po yid bde bar sems pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye gnas de dang / de dag la
101a5(1): gnas shing khrag yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar spong ba rnams la rang gi lus kyi khrag gtong ba'i me/ khrag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bde 'di ltar yongs su sngon/ dge
101a6(1): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad cas dang ye shes kyi lus dang lham cing byang chub sems dpa'i lus bun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang 'dra bar dge slong
101a7(1): lus dang ldan par byang ba'i// sems can thams cad lus nyams pa med cing dag pa dang lAm/ sras lam med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis mi 'grags pa'i sems dang ldan
101b1(1): zhing sbal pa la bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'ong dang ba'i lus nyams pa med pa dang ldan cing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin ga shegs par
101b2(1): skra mi gnas pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings su mngon par skyes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzhan thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i lus dang ldan ning rin po che lta bu'i 'od yod pa'i lus dang
101b3(1): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi skyid pa la dbang sgyur ba'i lus dang ldan zhing ye shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis
101b4(1): bal na ngon yod par skyes pas/ rin po che rgya mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi gce bas gos pa med cing bar snang gi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces
101b5(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la khrag gi sbyin pa byed pa de'i tshe ye shes kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po la rab tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su sde'o// dge pa'i yid
101b6(1): kyis yongs su snga'o// yangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// rangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// spro ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis
101b7(1): yongs su sngang// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// ngang ba'i yid kyis yongs su rdzab// mgu ba'i yid dang / rab tu mgu ba'i ying dang / yang bde zhing rangs ba skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongasu snga'o// 
102a1(1): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gzhal du med pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mkhas pa'i skye ba
102a2(1): brten pa'i zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa 'jig rten gyi dri ma bsal ba dang / spong ba thams cad kyis zang bar mi nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs pa'i yongs su gtang ba dang / lod
102a3(1): tan rini pa ches yang dag par blangs pa'i dge ba 'byam klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yings gyis gos par blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen pa dang / spong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dang bar bar
102a4(1): pa btang yang 'byor ba med pa'i sems dang / sbyid ba la dmigs pa'i dngas zhes shin du brtags pa'i las kyi rnam par srid pa'i rten dang / yor pa'i rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa med pa dang / 
102a5(1): sangs rgyas thams cad mngodan tu gyur pa pa lta bu'i 'du shes su mngon par 'dzin pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon tu gyur ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig rter gyi khams thams
102a6(1): cad bang tu gyur ba'i sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i snying rje chen pos yongs su skyob pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon tu gyur pa'i stobs
102a7(1): par byeng ba dang / 'das pa dang / mtshus padang/ dgang byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams sa ma na du byung ba'i dge pa'i rtsa pa 'gyun pa yangs su rdzogs par bya ba nga/ 
102b1(1): bams sa ca na du byung ba'i khyam ga dang/ zeng ba'i du bsgrags pa dang / dus bsum ma na du gyur ba'i dus thams cad pa'ams pa 'a ba'i zhes pa dus gzus mas cang rung du byung
102b2(1): mtha'i bskal par thug par zhe non pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / yongs su yi mtshad med pas mngon du gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa grangs med pas/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i phan pa tshol ba dang / 
102b3(1): rgyal po thams cad btong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs dag na gnas shing sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba de ltar slong ba rnams la/ 
102b4(1): lus las sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sha dang rkang yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can
102b5(1): thams cad rdo rje sring po ltar khregs pa'i yan lag dang ldan zhing mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gso ba med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas/ gsog ma yin pa'i lus dang ldan par
102b6(1): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus la rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
102b7(1): sras shi dgra ba par bsang dmas brgya ba'i mas kyi lus dang ldan par byar gyim/ sems ca thabs cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcus mi dang cing ma 'ams pa dang ldar te/ dab byang babang ba byang
103a1(1): bcus rnam par bris pas lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur ba thob pas mtha' las 'das pa chang med pa'i lus dang ldan
103a2(1): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms pas kun tu khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / ldan zhing thug par med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
103a3(1): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus zhi bar gyur cog/ sems can thams cad namamakha'i dbyings kur du chos kyis khyab par byed pa'i phyir/ rags pa meng
103a4(1): lus mngon par grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad shong ba'i lus dang ldan ming byang chub kyi lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
103a5(1): po thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa slong ba la sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa rnam par
103a6(1): dag par ba tuthab par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs su sa la/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye pa'i rgyud la brlabs pa'i sems dang ldar pa sa sbyin pas smyung pa'i sems dang lda pa/ nga ba
103a7(1): ma tshu sa 'angasas pa da nag pa maldan pa'i rgya ba sa sems dang nag/ byang chu sangs dpa' mas sa sa tshud pa ma ma pas pa mi pa gnas ma
103b1(1): bas thams cad kyis me shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dngas nga
103b2(1): sangs rgyas thams cad yi de la bya ba'i mngon du gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ spong ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu ba rab tu mchod pa'i seMs dang ldan pa/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
103b3(1): yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / rgyal po g.yo ba med pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su btang bar gyur pa ci/ de ltar spong ba kunan
103b4(1): 'ongs pa rnams kyis bslabs shing rang gi lus las snyid yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang / spong ba dang / thob par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab tu
103b5(1): dgrol ba'i phyir stobs bcu'i byang chub la dmigs par byed pa dang / smon lam chen po'i nan tu byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang / smon lam yongs su mi gtong
103b6(1): bas/ sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems cad thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bus yongs su bzung ba'i snying dpal gyi be'us brgyad pa dang ldan
103b7(1): zhing rdo rje'i re 'khor yug thams cad ltar mi shigs shing rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i snying dang ldan pa dang / bag cha ba med pa'i snying dang / thub par dka' ba'i snying dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi'i grogs srid
104a1(1): dang / dnga' ba'i rgyal mar na ye shes kyi sring po can gyi sring dang / mthu bo che chen po dam pa'i sems rgyal mtshan gyi snying dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bur mi / 
104a2(1): ba'i snying dang / mthu bo che ltar mi shigs pa'i snying po car gyi snying dang / bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud kyi sde rnam par 'dzem pa'i snying dang brtan pa'i snying dang / gzeng mtho ba'i snyin
104a3(1): dang / dpa' ba'i sring dang / gtum bong ba'i snying dang / mi 'jigs mi mdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i snying dang / rdo rje'i go cha chen po yang dag par bgos pa'i snying dang / shin du btsun pa'i byung
104a4(1): chub sems dpa'i snying dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sdang gyur pa'i snying dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su rtogs shing rlom
104a5(1): pa med par thams mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i snying dang / stobs bcu mngon par byang chub pa rab tu thob pa'i snying dang / ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems
104a6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying gi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i stobs bcu padang
104a7(1): bya'i thugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yongs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
104a8(1): po slong ba mngon par dang par byed pa'i lta po dang / gsal zhing dga' bar byed mig dang / byang chub dang mkham pa bya ba'i byams pa dang / cing dod pa'i slob ba bu dud du bya ba'i sbyin pa/ 
104b1(1): g+sa d+hA byi nga ga rgya nga/ gra 'ang la pa sa sgrang brgyang pas sa pa/ nar byang ba'i dus rdzas sun pa di byed pa / srung ka sa
104b2(1): dazang bar 'gyur ba'i lus rab tu rtog pa dang / gzhan la rag lus shing lus mi rtag par yid la byed la byed pa dang / lus kyi rgyus thams cad khong du rung ba dang / gzhan da pa'i sems
104b3(1): dang de lta bu'ichos de dag yid la bya ba la brtson pa dang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i legs par byin pa dang / rgyal po'i sdig pa gsal ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
104b4(1): chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang slong ba rnams la rgyu ma dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo bra yongs su btung bar gyur pa de ltar rgyu ma dang / 'dren pa dang / mkhal ma dang // 
104b5(1): glo ba yongs gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' slong ba de dag la mi 'gegs pa'i mig gis lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus mi rtag cing 'di ltar mi// 
104b6(1): gtsang na 'on kyang rgya ma dang mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba lta bu dag kyang slong ba dag la dgos pa ltas sbyin par bya'o/ zhes de lta bur yid la byed cing dge' rgyud dang / de ltar chos nyi
104b7(1): shes pa'i bsum pa dang / slong ba mthong ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen te 'du shes pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis lus po med bde la snying po blang bar 'dod de/ de lta bur yid byed cing rab tu sto
104b8(1): ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rgyum dang / mtshan pa dang / mkhal ma dang / gro ba de dag yongs su gtong ba'i che/ dge 'ichi bdi dag sems can thams cad la di lta yongs su sa ste/ 
105a1(1): rgyu ma dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / slob yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi snying
105a2(1): po'i lus dang ldan zhing / lus kyi phyi nang shin tu gtsang zhing dag gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lto nga
105a3(1): yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang spos zhim po'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing phyi rol tu 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas blta na bzang ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ 
105a4(1): simra can thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing ma'am pa'i lus kyis yan lag dung ldan te/ gzhu lta bu'i lho dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dang
105a5(1): bas lus shin du bskyed pa sa lus chos kyi zas dang / ye shes kyis gso bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i lus dang / chos kyi lus kyis yang dag par spyod par zad min+de
105a6(1): pabA lus dang ldar bar gyur cig/ sem ca tham cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pas gzungs kyi snying pos lus kyi rang rnam par drag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang gi ba
105a7(1): ba'i rgyud sani du sbyangs pas lus yongs dgu pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can rnams cad me shes kyi ngoms para' byed pa'i chos kyi spyir gyi na rab tu 'debs pas de bzhin gshegs
105a8(1): pa'i suM dang / ye shes kyi rnal 'byor khong du drad dper gyur cig/ sems can thams cad pha rol gyi lus 'gro ba thams cad la ye zhes kyi rgyal mtshan mdzes shing snang bar gyur pas/ 
105b1(1): nang gi lus dag cing zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu bu dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba de dag rang gi lus las
105b2(1): smospyod pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lus phyi nang yongs su dag cing bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa thob par bya
105b3(1): ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyal po skar ma'i dod dang / 
105b4(1): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis kyang yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa slong ba rnams la yongs su gtang bar gyur pa de ltar
105b5(1): yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa bslangs na slong bu rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ slong ba mthong ma thag tu sems dga' ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems dad pa dang / 
105b6(1): sems rab tu spro ba dang / sems 'thar pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / slob pa'i rnams la rim gro bya ba'i sems
105b7(1): rab tu 'thong ste/ de man lag dang / nyid lag dang / rus pa de dag bslabs pas spong ba la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dag sems can thams cad 'di ltar yongs su
105b8(1): sngos/ rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rus pa dang sha dang // khrag med pa'i gras tu rnal
106a1(1): pa lta bu'i lus can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus la thub pa med cing zil gyis mi non pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chag pa med
106a2(1): cing grol ba med pa dang / bcings pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lus 'byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / chos su ldan pa'i lus phur sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang po tha mi dad
106a3(1): cing gcad du med pa rab tu thob pas ye shes kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi stobs dang / dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas chos kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur
106a4(1): cig/ sems can thams cad lus shig shig po med pas yan lag shig du brtan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul bzhugs pas 'gro ba tham
106a5(1): thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i lus dang yan lag gi byin gyis brlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu bo che'i yan lag dang zhing lag yang dag par zin pas stobs chen po dang ldan zhing me
106a6(1): laganas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chad cing dub pa med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas shin tu brtan par lus kyi rgyud 'brel ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu
106a7(1): dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i lus kyis shin du brtan zhing stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i lus dang ldan zhing chos
106b1(1): kyi lus kyis 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing bltan don yod pa dang ldan te/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par
106b2(1): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas med pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug ste/ gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam pa byin gyis brlab
106b3(1): ba dang ldan ning sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi rjes su song ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i lus dang ldan par
106b4(1): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir phyogs pa med cing mngon par lta ba'i snang bas sgo kun nas blta ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha
106b5(1): cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la spyod pa brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba la brtson pas brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes brtan par gnas pa
106b6(1): thor pas nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rgyun 'chad cing rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin
106b7(1): dulas grub par gyur pas brtul zhugs dam po'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig sems can thams cad 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thams cad las rnam par 'das shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgengs
107a1(1): / byung ba'i lus su gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lag dang / shing lag dang / rus pa de dag slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i bu ba de dag
107a2(1): sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par bya ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi las las
107a3(1): slob dag gis mdog dang ldan pa'i lpags pa brlangs pa'i che/ mtshon cha thogs pa'i spong ba mthong ba yang dga' bar byed pa'i dbang pos spong ba la blta zhing / spong ba rnams la drin du gzo ba'i 'du shes zhes
107a4(1): bzhag nas legs par bting ba'i bstan la spong ba rnams bkod de/ slong ba rnams la rim gro'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa dang / len pa rnams la shin tu bkod pa'i 'du shes yang ga par skyed pa dang / 
107a5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhing gyur pa smon par bya ba yang dag par mthong bar sems shing spong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems kyis rtog cing 'jam pa dang ldan par lta bas/ slong ba rnams la lnga zhing chur
107a6(1): sheg long shig ces bya ba'i tshig brjod pa dang / spong ba rnams la bdag nyid ci dga' bar bya bar gtong ba de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i snying po dang ri dgas kyi rgyal po gser gyi rtsibs logs ra
107a7(1): mdog dang ldan pa'i grags paslong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i dra ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su su sa/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan
107b1(1): naces mams shing rngab par dag pas shin tu'a'adra ba'i ba dag dang ldan par gyur ro// sems can thams cad rdo rje'i ba dag thu bar dka' ba'i khadag nga ldan pa ma 'dres pa'i 'a dag dang ldan par gyur tsas
107b2(1): sems can thams cad 'jam bu ru klung gi gser gyi snying po ltar dag cing gser kyi mdog dang ldan par gyur ci// sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dog rnam par sbyangs pas dag cing 'dos
107b3(1): mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge sbyong de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzhon pa'i kha dog gis rnam par dag cing rlog pa med cing dang kha dog dang / mdog gi mchog da
107b4(1): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis kha dog rnams par dag cing kha thog dang mdog gi dab pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam
107b5(1): par bris shing sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par dag pa'i mdog dang / khe dog shin tu rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dog dang mdog bzang po phun sum tshogs shing / 'gro btun
107b6(1): tu mdog gi snang ba rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du min pa rnams par 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan ning
107b7(1): mdog 'od zer gyi dra bcan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/ mdog dang kha dog shin tu snum pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar
108a1(1): @#byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las mdog dang ldan pa'i lhag pa spong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sangs
108a2(1): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs sde'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems la phyin ci log med
108a3(1): ba'i bzhin 'dzum brtan/ yid bde 'thob pa/ theg pa chen po legs par gnas pa/ grags pa 'dod pa med pa'i snyid pa can/ sring zag pa nas sbyin pa gnas pa gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po la yid rab du nugs
108a4(1): pas/ 'jungs pa'i dri ma la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa phrag dog dang 'jungs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la rab tu zhugs pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta ba'i brtson 'grus
108a5(1): dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po gser gyi 'od dang / de ma yin dz+hab byang chub sems dpa' chang med pa gzhan dag gis kyang sor mo rnams yongs su gtang bar gyur pa ltar srong brkang lag gi sor mo yongs su
108a6(1): gang ba'i ma// dge ba'i drang de dag sams can thams cad la 'di ltar bsngos/ sor mo byin pa dang / cing spangs pa'i dngas pa 'bang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dra ba 'dis sems can thams cad
108a7(1): rgyas kyi phrag sor thob par gyur te sor ma ring bar gyur ci// sems can thams ca mang mor ba gyis gcol bar legs par grub pas sor po grum pa dang ldan par byu ga/ sems ca thams ca pa
108b1(1): gang ba'i sor mo rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing sen mo zangs kyi khwa dog lta bu'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'dzin par brtson pa'i sor mo dpe byad bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes
108b2(1): bu dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ser mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bcu'i phyag sor dang ldan par gyur te/ dpe byad bzang pos grub pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
108b3(1): can thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i sor mo tshul dang mthun par skyes pas/ sor mo'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo'i chos nyid kyi yan lag dang / bum pa gang bang
108b4(1): bkra shis kyis rnam par mdzes pa ldan zhing sor mo'irtse mo la 'khor lo yod pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sto bas bcu'i phyag sor phrin las kyi rnam par smin pa rgyu
108b5(1): mthun pa byung ba lta bu dang ldan zhing pad+ma bzang po dang / dga' ba 'khyil bas bsor mo thams cad kyi tshogs dang / yan lag shin tu brgyan cing dpe byad bzang pos mdzes par rnam par phye ba'i
108b6(1): brgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa snang bar bya ba la brtson zhing 'od zer gyi dra ba'i mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa'i sor mo dang ldan
108b7(1): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo shin tu mdzes pa dra ba legs pas 'brel pa dang ldan zhing / sor mo legs pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
109a1(1): / chen po sor mo spong ba rnams la song mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i phra ba de dag thams cad sems can
109a2(1): rnams la yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa la la zhig gis chos thos par bya bar bsams te/ des 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mong
109a3(1): byin na ni/ ngas khyod la chos bstan par bya'o zhes zer ba zhig yod na/ de la 'di skad du smra ba ste/ bdag gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo ci bder khyer la bdag la chos bstan par mdzod cig ces nas/ ji ltar rgyal
109a4(1): bo dbang phyug du gyur pa legs par bshad par tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zad mi shes pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan chad med pa chos kyi chos bzang po
109a5(1): nyid la brtson pa/ 'gro ba 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi lo shin tu lags par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sen rab tu 'grub cing
109a6(1): zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dpe byad bzang po'i sen mo rab tu thob cing mdog snum pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen po'i
109a7(1): ba bad nan sems cad mkhyen pa'i phyag se dang 'du mang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'ag da kyis legs shing batshungs pa zed nga sen me da ldan par kyar gyi// thamams
109b1(1): cad kyi 'od kyis spang bar bya ba la brtson zhing shin tu brgyan pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med cing rnab par dag pa'i sen mo gang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems cad
109b2(1): thams cad ye shes che ning yangs pa rnams par dag pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par
109b3(1): smin pas rnam par dag cing mdzes par skyes pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byed pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing / mgon po thams cad mkhyen
109b4(1): ba'i phyag sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa'i phyir sen mo dang shar bcas pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sang rgyas thams
109b5(1): cad kyi sgra dang byagasen gyis rgyan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi mthar byin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sde'o// bam po sum cu brgyad pa'o// // 'di ltar yang byang
109b6(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don du chos 'chol ba ltar len pa shin du dgon pa'i chos tshol ba la zhugs pa la chos gtong ba'i gang bgal las pa'i ltung su gzugs par
109b7(1): byas te/ 'di skad du gal te khyod me 'greng bdun du brkos pa'i me'i lhubs su 'tshong pod na/ ngas khyod la chos kyi sbyin par bya'o zhes na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas sgra de zos
110a1(1): @nas shin du dga' zhing yid bde ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa'i yid skyes nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ngan song thams cad dang mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal nyams
110a2(1): su brang ba dang / yang bsngo zhing bdag gis dam pa'i chos bcal dgo san/ 'di ltar mi'i me lhubs su 'chod pa tsam gyis dam pa'i chos rnyed par gyur na/ k+She ma de ltar dkon pa'i
110a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lta bu med pa mo'i mo'i lhubs tsam du mchod pas rnyed pa 'din de mtshar rje'o// 'di ltar dag gis mi 'gred bdun brkus
110a4(1): pa'i me'i ltabs su mthong par gyis/ khyod kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsil zhes nas/ de ji 'i rgyal po legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang / byang chus sems
110a5(1): sems dpa' dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dgas kyang me'i lhubs su 'chod pa byas pa de ltar chos kyi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bu slo ba lus
110a6(1): kyis me'i lhubs 'tshod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
110a7(1): las na slo me spes pa'i chos can gyur te/ thams cad rkyen pa'i gnas dang ldan pagyur cig/ sems can thams ca sangs rgyas kyi bde bathams cad myong bar gyur te/ gangs thams cad la
110b1(1): byir ldog pa 'gyur cig/ sems can rdzas cad 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag cha ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / 
110b2(1): chos thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu thob cing chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad me gsum rab tu zhibs gnas pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ngan song gi lam thams cad dang shin
110b3(1): tu bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa bdu thob ste/ yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa gyur cig/ sems can thams cad me gsum dang bral zhing byang chub kyi
110b4(1): sems kyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i dga' bas yang dag par spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
110b5(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa med pa la rab tu gzhol zhing shin tu thos pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ sems can
110b6(1): thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su shin du song ba'i chos dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i bde ba rab rab tu thob par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems
110b7(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tshol zhing mo'i rabs sum chongs pas/ yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sgrib pa'i las dang spyod pa'i mja' phyin cing ye shes kyi me
111a1(1): @shin du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsdu'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad bdag gi lus kyis
111a2(1): bzer bar byed cing dam pa'i chos rjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lam ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gsal bar byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po'i tshogs yang dag par spogs pa dang / 
111a3(1): stobs bcul brtson par byed cing / thams cad mkhyen par sems skyed pa yangs par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po la bdag mngon du 'brum par yang dag lnga nings sems can thams cad/ 
111a4(1): kyi rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa dang / ye shes chen po la btsun ni nga sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su srung ba
111a5(1): che/ ri ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos babang po'i tshol ba dang / rgyal po shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang / de ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' gnan chad med pa/ dag gis kyang ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du/ de sdug bsngal
111a6(1): kyi rnam pa gcig ma yin pa rnams su 'bab pa dang / sdug bsngal tshor ba'i gnod pa rnam pasna tshogs myong ba/ sdug bsngal byi nad pa thams cad dang pra pa rang gi lus kyi nabar len cing bzod pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i
111a7(1): chos spong ba'i gang zag sesam ga tum pa can/ sdig pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa/ bdud kyi las kyis byin gyis dbri pa dag las/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa de dag thams cad nye bar len pa'i/ 
111b1(1): bzod par byed pa'i sgra dge ba'i rtse ba de dag 'di ltar dam pa'i chos shes par byabri phyir yongs ste/ dge ba'i la 'das semam thams cad pa de ba'i nanang na gyis mngom par shes pa myur ba dang ldan
111b2(1): zhing sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba yongasu spangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde bo'i rnam pa thams cad rab tu thob pa la gnas pas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ 
111b3(1): sems can thams cad mig yor lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob cing sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad 'gags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi spyod pa'i mthar byin te/ sdug bsngal
111b4(1): gyi btson nas phyir ldog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi lam rgyud dang rtse ba thams cad las phyir log cing bde ba'i lam mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba thams
111b5(1): cad shin du rnam par chad pas chos kyi dga' ba dang b+h+ri rnam pas shin du brtan par gyur cig/ sem can thams cad phan chun du zhe mo sdang zhing byams pa rab tu thos pas sdug bsngal las grol bar gyur cig/ sems
111b6(1): can thams cad 'khor ba thams cad na yod pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu byang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i don mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
111b7(1): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad kyis lus la gnod par 'gyur ba med cig/ 'thab med pa'i bde brnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can tham ca sang rgyas kyi de ba bsnying pa med papa na
112a1(1): byin te/ bde ba'i khyad par thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi rnam bzang
112a2(1): cad bzod par byed cing / nyams su len pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba'i thams cad g.yang sa las bsrung zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i blar thar pa bsgribs pa med pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs
112a3(1): bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos btsal ba la shin tu brtson pa/ chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'khor las yang dag par len par 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
112a4(1): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba dang / rjes su dran pa la gnas pa/ chos kyi dga' bas spro zhing mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos rab tu btsal ba la brtson pa/ 
112a5(1): badzag rten pa'i rgyal po'i srid dang / snying pa'i ldan ljin thams cad las rnam par 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid dang / chos kyi sring pa la ngon par mos pa/ 'jig rten gyi dga' ba thams cad kyis mgos pa'i
112a6(1): yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' bas sems shin tu spel ba/ 'jig rten gyi skyid pa zang zing dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa spros pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa rab tu thob pa mngon
112a7(1): ba gas pangs bya ba'i mthar dag dzin pagra sa bya 'dzag then bcu ba dang / phral dang yul bu bakhrag dzig dang / skya ba brams 'angams gang ba rnapa pamams sa da / spangs rgya
112b1(1): khyim gyis gang ba/ bza' shing ger ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ni dga' bar bya ba'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ chu klung yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang / gring shing dang / bza' shing mdangs dga' bas shin du brgyan pa
112b2(1): 'khrug long med cing shin tu bde ba/ gzhan gyi khams shin tu bcom pa/ bdag gi khams la nyams pa med pa/ gser dang rin po che'i mdzod dang / bang ba bye ba khrag khrig song gis brgyan pa bu dang / bu mo dang
112b3(1): chung ma dang / 'khong sa tshogs dang chung ma'i 'khor sna tshogs yod pa grong khyer byed khrig brgya stong dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / pho brang chen po yod pa de lta bu chos kyi don dang chos btsal ba'i phyir tshig
112b4(1): dang yi ge'i 'brug cig gi don du yang rgyal po'i srid snying po med pa las snying po bskyed cing / chos la dkon pa'i 'du shes rab tu bskyed nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa
112b5(1): bsgribs pa med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam rnam par dag pa 'tshol zhing / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dpal dang / rgyal po khyad par dpal dpal dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems
112b6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis kyang ji ltar spyad par gyur pa de bzhin du yongs su btang ste/ chos btsal bas yang yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs sngo ste/ 
112b7(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad lagashin du che bar gtong ba la mngon par mos shing shin du yangs pa'i gtong ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i bdag
113a1(1): @por gyur to// btang ba thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus dang srog dang yo byad la mi lta bas chos tshol ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig
113a2(1): sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pas tshim par bya ba la brtson zhing chos thob par bya bas shin tu dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la yid dga'
113a3(1): ba rab tu thob cing chos la mngon par dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i sems chen pos spyod pa dang / byang chub chad med pas lus dang / srog dang / 'jig rten
113a4(1): kyi skyed pa yongs su gtong bar gyur // sems can thams cad lam dang thogs mig 'jams kyi dga' ba'i mthar thug pas/ chos kyi ring po dang / sriT bduthu ba par gyur bya// sems na
113a5(1): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu dkon pa mnyan pa la brtson cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnan gyi dring mi
113a6(1): 'jog pa'i mthar phyin cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rab tu shes pa'i yid kyis the tshom gyi zug rngu dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad
113a7(1): nges par rdzogs pa mang bar gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge pa'i dra ba de dag thams cad kyidan du chos thams cad kyi dang du chos bcal ba dang / chos thams
113b1(1): cad kyi don dang bde ba'i lam gyi ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbang phyug byed cing srog gcod
113b2(1): baspangs pa la sems can rnams rab tu gzhol ba dang / 'dzam bu gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad kyi zhan pa dang / bsad pa'i
113b3(1): gnas thams cad rnam par gcod pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas mang po la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa byed pa dang / lhod pa med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
113b4(1): gnas pa dang / mkhon pa med pa'i sems kyis rgyal po'i sridang thams cad la gnas pa dang / sems can gyi mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bde bar
113b5(1): byed pa'i sems rin po che bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rin po che dang 'dra ba'i bsam pa rin po che rab tu sgrub pa dang / sdom pa gsum rnam par dag pa la gnas shing gzhan rab tu 'jog
113b6(1): pa'i tshe srog gcod pa spangs dang / bslab pa lnga la sems can rab tu bzhag pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can
113b7(1): thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i sems so sor thob cing srog gi dbang po bcad du med pa dang / tshe ring zhing shes rab tu thob par gyur zhing / rga shi med pa'i chos la rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ 
114a1(1): sems can thams cad tshe ji srid du 'dod cing bsams par gnas pa la gnas shing / nad med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa byed
114a2(1): brgyar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la zhugs te che 'gag pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par gsag
114a3(1): ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur cig che'i dngos 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad che'i tshad 'gag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smod lam yongs su rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsams pa thams cad 'ang
114a4(1): su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad che chad zang mi shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson cing / sangs rgyas thams cad bathong ba dang mazhes par bya ba'i dus dang mnyam par byur cig/ sems can mas
114a5(1): cad 'phags pa'i chos dga' ba rab tu thob cing srog gi dbang po 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye mched la bslab bar bya bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu stobs dang badron 'grus cang
114a6(1): mi shes pa rab tu thob s+ho/ sems rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dbang skur ba la rab tu 'jog pa dang / rga ba dngan pa med pa'i tshe phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge
114a7(1): nga'i chu ba de sa sems ca thams cad kyis de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes shin du rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / sdom pa gsum rnam par rang du pa'i phyir yang sdom
114b1(1): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa/ rkang bzhi pa dang mir gyur pa rnams kyi pho mtshan gcad par gyur cing skyes pa'i rang bzhin dang dpral bar gyur pa/ skyes
114b2(1): bu'i dngos po gzhig par gyur pa/ nyung rum gyis dngos po la gzhag par 'gyur ba/ lus la gnod pa shin tu mi zad par gyur pa mthong ba dang skyes pa'i dngos po las bzlog par gyur pa/ bo mo gnyis kra ma yin pa'i
114b3(1): skye gnas su bzhag par gyur pa/ sdug bsngal gyis tshor bas mnar bar gyur pa/ lus mi bde ba'i shin tu gzir bar gyur pa/ skyes par tshul gyis dpag pa tsam du gyur pa/ brten pa'i lus 'gag par
114b4(1): gyur pa dang / sems can rnams kyi gnod pa de lta bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong na/ byams pa mam chen pos sems can rnams yongasu skyo bcing snying rje chen po sngor du btang
114b5(1): ste/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa las nyams par 'gyur ba thams cad rnam par bzlog go// rab tu rgyun gcod do// yongs su skyob po// rnam par chad byed do// 
114b6(1): chos dang mthun pa'i mdzod dang / dngang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang gtong zhing tshig 'di skad du brjod de/ khyed kyis gang gi phyir sdig pa'i las rnam pa 'di lta bu byang bar gyur pa de'i bde ba dang
114b7(1): phan pa'i rnam pa thams cad ngas sbyar gyis sdig pa'i las kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tshul bzhin pa yin pa la 'jug par sems skyes pas bde ba myong ba myong ba'i don du khyod ma byed cig/ de ltar
115a1(1): pha rol la sdig pa'i las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag byas shing bdag gi tshor bar myong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas pa ma yin te/ de'i gnas med do// de ltar sdig pa'i
115a2(1): rnam pa 'di lta bu la spyod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spang ba'o zhes nas de ma yin pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gzhan dag byed pa mthong na/ yang rnam par zlog par byed cing / 
115a3(1): sems can thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su yang dag par sdud do// yo byad thams cad kyis kyang mngon par sdud par byed do// 'di lta ste dben pa'i chos la yid ches par byed pa
115a4(1): dang / dge ba'i las shin tu bsags pa dang / mi dge ba'i las phani tshun du byams pa'i sems kyis spyod pa dang / phan tshun du mi gnod cing mi gtse ba'i phyir legs par bshad pas kyang shin
115a5(1): du ngoms par byed do// sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chog thos nas sdig pa'i las lding ngo // rnam par ldog go/ mi spyod do// des de ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i phu bde dag
115a6(1): 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gsang bsgrubs nas 'jug pa dang ldan zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams
115a7(1): bang 'dron 'grus dang / 'ag nga'i bsam pa dang mangs pa'i spyod cing byas dracan po'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur ci// sems can thams cad dgas pa med pa dnga' ba'i ma shes la yang das
115b1(1): gnas pa las mi ldog cing / shin du brtan pa'i dbang sbyar ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i dga' bas mi bzlogs/ ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan par zung rtsig
115b2(1): sems can thams cad smad pa med par thams cad mkhyen par 'byung ba'i ye shes bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu 'byung ba'i ngan
115b3(1): ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing skyes bu chen po'i stobs ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams drang rmad du byung ba'i tshigs la gnas pa rab tu thob cing / dus thams cad du skyes bu'i dbang po 'am
115b4(1): pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas dbang du sbyar zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i
115b5(1): yon tan gyi dga' ba la chags pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis shes shing yid ches pa'i dul ba dang ldan
115b6(1): zhing stes bu mkhas pa'i dam par gyur cig// sems can thams cad skyes bu dam pa sangs rgya kyi mkhyen pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rdul dang ldan par
115b7(1): gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa'i skye ba thob pa'i ye shes kyi skyeg
116a1(1): dang / rigs la yang dag par brtson pa/ skyes bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul shes pas yang dag par spyod pa/ skyes bu tshul bdun yang dag par mthong zhing rtog
116a2(1): bskyes bu'i 'bru rtsal dam pa dang / skyes bu'i 'bru rtsal ma nor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dang / dpa' bo'i skyes bu'i mthu rtsal dang / bstan pa'i skyes bu'i mdurdul
116a3(1): gyis yang dag par bzung ba de skyes bu'i dbang po gcad par byas pa dang / skyes bu'i dbang po brtan par byas pas yang dag par gzung ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad gang gis de bzhin gshes
116a4(1): ba'i rab kyi mthu rtsal yongs su dag par rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bur 'grung bar yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
116a5(1): bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad grags par byed pa dang / sem sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // zhes sangs rgyas
116a6(1): kyi sgra sgrog cing / sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kun tu grags par byed pa dang / sems can gyi nga rgyal dang / bag med pa dang / smos pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar
116a7(1): sems can rnams yang dag par srabs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems can rnams rab tu gnog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la gzhol bar byed pa dang / 
116b1(1): sangs kyi dmigs pa la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can la rim gro byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rtogs pa sems can rnams la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas brjod pa la sems
116b2(1): can rnams yang dag par gzud pa dang / skal pa bye bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skye ba ni shin tu dkon no zhes bya ba'i tshig sems can rnams la rjod pa dang / sems can de dag gis kyang
116b3(1): de'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim gro dang zhes byed pa dang dga' ba dang / spro bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ba dang
116b4(1): sangs grangs med pa la shin tu bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gter rnams par sbyong ba dang / srog chags bye
116b5(1): ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rab tu shes
116b6(1): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la yid ches pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad skal pa grangs med par skyed cing spel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ sangs
116b7(1): rgyas kyi bran las yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byas te// mi mnye
117a1(1): bar mi byed pa dang sangs rgyas lta ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams dang rgyas thams cad lta ba yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas lta bar brtson
117a2(1): pa'i yid dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / chos kyis mdzod yang dag par 'dzin cing ye shes sgom pa shin tu mang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams
117a3(1): cad chos mnyan pa dang / mi 'bral zhing bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ sems can
117a4(1): thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad mthong zhing ye shes yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yid la bya ba da nga / mthong ba
117a5(1): bya ba'i mthul brtson pa zhing yid la bya ba dang / las gzhan med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kun du sangs rgyas mthor ba'i 'byung gnas la bzhugs shing phyis
117a6(1): kun du sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kun du sangs rgyas byung ba brjod pa la badron zhing sangs rgyas kyi sgras byin gyis brlabs par
117a7(1): byed gyi// sems can thams cad pas pa dang dadang mi shigs pa dang / sring thag pa'i bams pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur te/ dge ba'i zigs gnyen gyis sangasas
117b1(1): rgyas kyis chos rdzogs par thos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ste ba don yod pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par spyad pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas skye bajam cad du brjod par gyur
117b2(1): cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas skye ba brjod pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 
117b3(1): mnyes par byed pa dang / mi mnyes par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i mthar phyin par yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
117b4(1): sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pho brang gi longs spyod dag/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ci dga' ba'i longs spyod dam 'phags pa'i dge
117b5(1): 'dun gyi cug lag khang gi longs spyod dam/ pha ma gnas pa'i gnas sam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sam/ gang ga gi rnam pa sbyin pa'i gnas dag gam de ma yin pa'i bodra pa dang / bkren
117b6(1): bskong zhing len pa dgagam/ 'khong bran phongs par gnas pa'i gnas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten drug pa'i gnas sam/ yo byang sa tshogs gzhag pa'i gnas ci 'dod pa'i langs
117b7(1): spyod du bya ba'ang/ 'jigs pa dang dog pa med cing dgra dang bral bas sdig ya' ba med pa'i gnas kyis dag 'bral ba'i che/ sa'i sbyin pa yong su btang bas yul ci 'dod par byin pas yang dag
118a1(1): par gzung ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob
118a2(1): cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa yongs su dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa la dran pa'i dbang po rmongs pa med cings lta bur red par gyur
118a3(1): cing / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa thams cad srung ba la zhugs shing / yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la zhe sdang med cing dge ba'i
118a4(1): bsam pa rnam par spyod pa la brtson pas sems dang mnyam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yang dag par
118a5(1): bsgrubs pa la mkhas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba
118a6(1): rnam par dag pa'i lam la zhugs te gnas su rjed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rab tu dgod par brtson zhing sangs rgyas lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la ngan
118a7(1): 'dogs par gyur gyi// sems cathams cad sang sa rgyas kyi dga' ba blang med pal rab tu gnog pa'i drirang 'gro bathams cad kyi dga' ba 'ad par gyur gyi// thams ca thams cas
118b1(1): rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos kyi 'byung garnasas zer te/ rab tu 'thad pal mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad batshas kyis rnam pa
118b2(1): zhing yongs su spyod bzo ba ste/ sa lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ cis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong bas yang dag
118b3(1): bzung ba'i dge bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su dag pa thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la
118b4(1): yongs sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ba'i rnams la rim gro'i don du bdag gi bran dang las byed pa rnams 'bral ba 'am
118b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par spel bar brtson pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ ba dang / ma 'am
118b6(1): slob dpon dang / bla ma'i sbyin gnas la bran dang las byed pa'i mi 'bral ba dang / sems can nad pa rnams la rim gro byed pa med pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bar rim gro bya ba'i phyir bran dang las
118b7(1): byed pa'i mi sbyin pa'am/ de ma yin pa'i sems can g.yog med pa la bran las byed pa'i mi gtong ba'am/ 'phongs pa dang bkren pa slong zhing len pa gzhan dag la bran dang / las byed pa
119a1(1): @mi gtong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten bsrung ba'i phyir 'bral ba'am/ dam pa'i chos yongs su srung
119a2(1): phyir yi ge dang grang shin du bslabs pa'i mi bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong mang po 'bul ba byed cing rim gro pa de dag kyang mkhas pa tshul shes pa/ cang shes pa brtson pa/ le lo med pa/ drang ba dang drang ba
119a3(1): dang ldan pa/ phan par sems pa/ bde bar sems pa/ byams par sems pa/ rim 'gro byed pa'i dngang tshul can/ khon med pa/ gcugs med pa yongs spyad pa/ bzo dang sgyu rtsal sna tshogs
119a4(1): dang / grangs la shin tu brlabs pa'i shes pa gsal ba can/ rim po'i tshul shes pa/ dga' bar byed cing rim gro byed pal brtson zhing stong pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las las byung ba yid du
119a5(1): bathad pa/ rim gro byed pa/ sems shin tu dad pa/ de lta bu'i rim gro dag gnas gang 'os pa dang / ci rigs pa dang / phan 'dogs pade dang / de dag la 'dul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa
119a6(1): byed pa'i che/ dge ri'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rim gro pa yang dag par btang ba dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
119a7(1): thams cad bsnyen pagrar ba dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas shing con te/ sang shes kyisems dang ldan par gyur ci// sems casems cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bka' mngadros par yin gyi
119b1(1): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthun pa'i rim gro par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid la bya ba dang bsam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa gzhan med cing sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu skad bye bar gyur
119b2(1): cig sems can thams cad dge ba thams cad yang dag yang dag par sdud pa la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs las mi nyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis rjes su stegs par gyur gyi
119b3(1): sems can thams cad don yod par dus thams cad du phrad cing sangs rgyas thams cad dus dang mthun par rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yi ge rnam
119b4(1): par dag pas mi 'jigs par spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi don 'dzin par gyur sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la lus dang srog bral zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la ngoms
119b5(1): bar lta bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad yang dag par 'joms pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
119b6(1): cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa dang / de ma yin pa'i gzhan med cing sangs rgyas thams cad la rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos blar med pa la mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang blar
119b7(1): gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo gros dang ldan par gyur cig cis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim gro pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i
120a1(1): rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa rnyog pa med pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan la rag lus
120a2(1): pa med pa'i rten gyi tshul rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' bar byas shing sa la gting ba'i rngog lam dang 'dra
120a3(1): ba'i sems su byas te/ sa dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bzod par mi 'gyur ba mi skyo ba/ sems can thams cad la rib gro byed pas dal ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ sems can
120a4(1): cad kyi sbyin bdag dge ba'i rtsab thams cad ni bar stobs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba byis pas zhes par byas pa nyams su len cing rnal gzon pa'i dang tshul can// dge ba shin tu brtan
120a5(1): ba la brtson pa/ yid la byed pa bzang pos gnas pa la brtson pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad snyen bkur ba'i sems kyis/ bdag nyid rim gro par 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i
120a6(1): bde dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang mi sems can thams cad shin tu rim gro ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems
120a7(1): dba'i do thams pa med pa dang / rinas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam du lags bzhugs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa zhid yod du chung bar 'gyur ba das
120b1(1): ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bdag nyid bgrang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dben pa'i tshig dang 'grogs pa rjes su spang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang
120b2(1): khams gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rtogs par sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas
120b3(1): kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med cing / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag thams cad yon tan chen po rab tu zhugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
120b4(1): mthar shin tu thug par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo'o// de 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// 'di ltar lus kyi rim gro sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa
120b5(1): des sems can thams cad yongs su rtogs pa'i chos rab tu 'dzin pa'i chos can/ yang dag par len pa'i chos can/ mi khrul pa'i chos can/ chud mi za ba'i chos can/ mi nyams pa'i chos can
120b6(1): mi 'bral ba'i chos can/ yid shin tu dral ba'i chos can/ chos kyis nye bar dul ba'i chos can gyi rim gro pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu nye bar sems pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces
120b7(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro'i nan tan du byas te/ sems can 'di dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba des mchod rten gyi dam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad bsnyen
121a1(1): bkur bar 'os par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i gnas dam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba tham
121a2(1): cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir len pa'i dam par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir sbyin bsreg
121a3(1): dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / khams gsum thams cad nas 'byung ba'i dam par 'gyur ba dang / lam ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par brtan pa'i phyir ded dpon dam par 'gyur ba dang / 
121a4(1): sangs kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa bzung ba'i phyir gzungs dam pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rags pa med pa'i lam gyis 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings chad med pa
121a5(1): dam par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag rim gro par bral bas yang dag par gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyi khams thams
121a6(1): cad phyag bya bar 'os pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir sems can la yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos la dga' ba dang / rab tu ga
121a7(1): dpa'i mas kyis sang rnam bachim ldadu ba rnams sa cas dayon chag phra med pa layis pa'i babam pa dang / sas rgyas thams dam nga sa pa 'byed padang ces bya ba ma dang 'ang/ 
121b1(1): med pa'i chos kyis khong du chud cing yang dag par bzung ba dang / shes rab chen po rin po che la yang dag par gzhol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa mtha' yas brjes
121b2(1): su dran pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag khong du rud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul dang / 
121b3(1): don gyi rjes su 'azang bas de bzhin bshags pa'i ldem po dag khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi char mngon par bab pa drang / rtul bo bas
121b4(1): dbang sgyur ba sems kyi dpa' bas thob pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i phun sum tshogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa gang zag gi sar shin tu bstan pa dang / chos chen po bye ba brgya stong chad
121b5(1): med pas shin tu brtan pa'i dbang pos bdag gis lus 'bul zhing de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de lta bu dag nyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba tshad med pa rnam
121b6(1): 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can dam pa rang gi the tshom gcod pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan mas sems ma mnyams pa/ 
121b7(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams cad dang / yon tan gyi'i byung gnas rab tu thob pa/ bsam pa tshad med pa'i spyod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdorje sa
123a1(1): su gtong ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mig yor bur bdag sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la ston pa
123a2(1): dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bur bdag sems thams cad la bu stongs pa dang / lam lta bur bdag sems can thams cad la yang dag par ston pa dang / blan med pa'i rnam par rab tu thob
123a3(1): blta bur bdag sems can thams cad la yongs su sbyong ba dang / nyi ma lta bur bdag 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par byed pa dang / de lta bu'i chos dang ldan par bdag sems can thams cad la
123a4(1): yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ bdag btang pas byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye she
123a5(1): kyis rab tu phyin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi
123a6(1): dkyil 'khor dra dral bathob par gyur tsag/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyir chung pa phun su mtshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dang chos dang ye ces dang / 
123a7(1): mngon pa zhes pa dang ldan cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthu yod par byung mo// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs drung bas rab tu tshim par gyur ci// sems ca thams
123b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sa byung bas rab tu tshim par gyur cig// sems cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgangs pa dge bas ma rig pa'i bsas pas ngab pang byung du
123b2(1): sems pan thams cad byang chub tu rdung dug pa'i dra ba dang ldan pas sam byung ba byungaso// sems can thams cad 'dre ba'i sems brlang pa dang dral thom sa kyi
123b3(1): gyur cig /  sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ston pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir yongs su sung bathob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chu sems dpa 'angs dang 'chen po sems can ngas
123b4(1): cad la bdag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su ru
123b5(1): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad la drin du gzo ba'i sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rim gro bya ba dang / du ltar bsam pa dang / de bzhin
123b6(1): gshegs pa thams cad byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems 'od spang zhing dang bar byon gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes las
123b7(1): bdag phyir log par bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi rigs su gtogs par bgrang ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthun par gzung ba dang / bdag bdud kyi yul las ring du bya ba dang
124a1(1): bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snong du rgyan kyis brlab pa dang / dal dang ngas la bdun pang byung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sabs bya na thasangs rgyasatha
124a2(1): cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems cad thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur
124a3(1): sems nye bar bstan pa rnams par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sdig to'i las thams cad la zhe sdang zhing shes dang yang dag par 'grogs par gyur cig/ sems can
124a4(1): thams cad shin tu bzung ba'i chos can du gyur te/ mi byed pa'i g.yog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang bsrung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa tho bstem/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
124a5(1): cad kyi slong mar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba thams cad las shin du 'das te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems
124a6(1): dpa'i chos med pa la yang dag par spyod cing / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthun par gyur cig sems can thams cad thabs cad bakhyen pa'i ye shes su lung bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas la dmigs
124a7(1): ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang sbyar zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad la rag lus par gyur cig// sems can thams cad len pa med pa'i
124b1(1): lus mngon par 'du byed par/ de bzhin pashegs pa thams cad byas na bar brdung bar gyur ci// sems canathams cad la zhes kyi snong nga sa sangs rgyas thams ca pan par dra la brdzun
124b2(1): nang mangs rgyas thams cad la bstan par byed pa'i dam par thar cig cas du ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen padi ngan gshes sa sa ma ma rnyeng pas yang
124b3(1): bzung ba'i dag pa'i rtsa bde dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon du gyur bas yongs su sde'o// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems kyis yongs su sa// 'bas gsu
124b4(1): pa thams cad las byung ba'i sems kyis yos su su'o// gnod pa med pa'i rgyud kyis yongs su sngo'o// tshad med pa'i byang chub yongs pa thob pas yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
124b5(1): kyi snang bar byas pa'i shes pas yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin du bzung ba'i yongs su sngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas yongs su sngal
124b6(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos la mos pas yongs su su'o// 'das pa dang / ma byin pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dge ba'i dra bgacig tu byas te/ yongs su
124b7(1): sngo'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir 'gyod pa'i sems shin du rdzogs par 'gyur bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// 
125a1(1): / bam po gsum cu dgu pa// / 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad las
125a2(1): rnam par 'das pa/ rgyal po'i srid la zhan pa'i bsam pa med pa/ ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa snyid bsam bcings pa/ rgyal po'i srid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ yongs su
